channel.title: Mentats of Gaming presents: Trap-a-Day
channel.description: Killing characters one trap at a time!

item.title: Dance Hall (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several skeletons dance to jaunty music as bright lights reflect from small crystal balls on the ceiling.

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device 34

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The skeletons do not attack. However, at some point, everyone is hit by an irresistible dance effect. Once this happens, all the skeletons take attacks of opportunity, and 1d6+1 balls fall on the ground and detonate. Dance Effect (DC 27 Will save or dance for 1d4+1 rounds, successful save reduces this to 1 round); Crystal Balls (3d6 damage, DC 18 Reflex save for half damage); Skeletons (1d4+1 skeletons attack per round, +8 melee for 1d6+1 damage)

item.title: Mesmerizing Tattoo (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The desk is covered in expensive looking books and a small portrait.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone touches a book, the portrait disappears and becomes a tattoo on the arm of the victim. The tattoo then begins to chat incessantly about everything and nothing in a monotone, almost mesmerizing tone. Tattoo (DC 21 Will save or get tattoo, causing -2 on Stealth and Charisma based checks, and also giving a -2 penalty to concentration checks, as well as causing and spells to require a concentration check)

item.title: Acid Sap (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Sap drips down from the branches overhead.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 22

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

Sap drips periodically from the branches overhead. Sap (DC 21 Reflex Save or take 2d6 acid damage)

item.title: Dark Chocolate (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A huge vat hangs above the area.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

When the trap is triggered, dark chocolate streams out of the vat, covering everyone in sticky chocolate. Chocolate (DC 22 Will Save or fall in love with the next person you see); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Comfy Chair (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An overstuffed chair is in the middle of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

When someone looks at the chair, they have an overwhelming desire to sit in it and take a nap. Comfy chair (DC 19 Will Save or sit in chair and fall asleep for 5 minutes)

item.title: Torch Flares (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several torches burn on the walls.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

When the PCs get about halfway down the hall, the torches flare brightly. Flare (DC 15 Fortitude save or be dazzled for one minute); multiple targets (all targets in hallway)

item.title: Mirrored Ceiling (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The ceiling of the hallway is mirrored.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 21

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

If more than 400 lbs. of weight is present in the hallway at any given time, the mirror above shatters and falls, revealing a crawlspace above it. Shattering Mirror (4d6 damage, DC 21 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in hallway)

item.title: Blackened Nails (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Personal effects, some valuable, cover the top of this writing desk.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone disturbs the contents on top of the desk, an aura appears around the desk, splitting and blackening fingernails. Blackened Nails (DC 16 Fortitude save or take 1d3 damage and have their fingernails split and blackened, causing a -1 penalty to any Dex based check for 1d4-1 days)

item.title: Mislabelled Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door ahead had the word "Push" scrawled on it in barely legible common.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 17; Disable Device 16

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

If the door is pushed, it opens. If it is pulled, it falls over. Door (DC 16 Reflex save or take 1d6 damage)

item.title: Blighted Chest (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sturdy, locked, iron-bound chest sits in the back of this closet.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the chest is opened without the key (DC 28 Disable Device), a bright light flashes from the chest, followed by a cloud of greasy darkness. The bright light changes everyone's alignment temporarily to neutral good (DC 21 Will Save negates). Then the greasy darkness covers a 20' area and deals 3d8 damage and sickens for 1d4 rounds. (DC 21 Will save negates sickness and halves damage); multiple targets (all targets within 20')

item.title: Leech Sand (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The ground here is sandy and thick.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The sand seems to suck in your feet as you walk. If a PC spends a movement action in the sand, they become exhausted. Sand (DC 19 Fortitude save or become exhausted for 5 minutes, a successful save means the target is fatigued instead); multiple targets (all targets in sand)

item.title: Spiked Flagstone (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is made of flagstone tiles.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 17

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

When the tile is stepped on, it compresses the spring underneath it, and slide down a sharp spike. Spiked Flagstone (DC 17 Reflex save or take 1d6 damage and have move speed reduced by 1/2 until magical healing is applied)

item.title: Ball Bearing Ramp (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A steep ramp heads downwards.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 18

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

Several tiny ball bearings adhere to the surface of the ramp, breaking loose with slight pressure. Ball bearings (DC 19 Reflex Save or be knocked prone, sliding to the bottom of the ramp, and taking 1d6 damage)

item.title: Trompe-l'œil Pit (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The wooden floor in this hallway is worn and discolored in places.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 16; Disable Device 16

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

Halfway down the hall there is a 10'x10'x20' pit. It has been cleverly painted to blend in to the floor if approached from this side, making it hard to see. Pit (DC 18 Reflex save or fall into pit, taking 2d6 damage)

item.title: Portal Pits (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The hallway is long and narrow.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

At some point down the corridor, small pits appear in the ground. When stepped upon, a portal appears on the side of the wall, causing the foot going through to kick another PC. Pits (DC 24 Reflex Save or a random party member takes 1d6 points of damage)

item.title: Razor Blinds (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A set of blinds is partially closed, obscuring the view out the window.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 23

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

If the blinds are altered or opened, they constrict on the PC violently; the blinds are razor sharp. Blinds (+18 vs. AC or take 3d6 damage plus 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Static Carpet (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The carpet is very thick and the air is very dry.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device 24

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

About halfway down, static builds up and discharges. Static Discharge (5d6 damage, DC 21 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in a 30' line from triggering character)

item.title: Rocket Chest (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A heavy, iron chest sits at one end of the room. The walls in here have spikes.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 21

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If the chest is opened, rockets fire off, smashing the chest into the PC and driving them into the wall. Rocket Chest (DC 24 Reflex Save or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage plus 3d6 piercing damage, and be pushed into the spikes)

item.title: Stacked Coin Trap (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Stacks of coins are arranged in a complex array.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 28

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

The coins have to be unstacked in a specific manner that requires a DC 31 Engineering check to undo. Otherwise, they topple. Toppling Coins(DC 24 Reflex save or take 5d6 crushing damage); multiple targets(all targets within 15')

item.title: Spongy Floor (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor seems to be made out of a sponge.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 22

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Treat floor as difficult terrain. After someone has spent 2 rounds on the floor, the acid from below seeps in. Acid (1d6 acid damage per round); multiple targets (all targets on floor)

item.title: Poison Quill (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small table contains a few scrolls, a quill and an inkwell.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone touches one of the scrolls, the quill fires at the PC. Quill (+12 vs. AC or lose 1d2 Str for 4 rounds, DC 14 Fortitude save cures)

item.title: Exploding Well (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A deep well sits just inside the keep's main outer wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

The liquid at the bottom of this 60' well reacts violently to small amounts of copper. If a copper piece is thrown in, it violently reacts, exploding, causing the area to collapse as well. Well (DC 27 Reflex Save or take 3d6 blast damage and 6d6 falling damage; DC 22 Reflex Save or take 3d6 blast damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Juicer (CR 12)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The stairs of this stone tower spiral up the wall. They are sharp on the edges.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device 26

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

When someone starts up the stairs, the collapse into the floor, and begin to spin very quickly, dicing up anyone. Juicer (DC 24 Reflex Save or take 12d6 damage per round for 1d4 rounds); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Explosive Flagstones (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The hallway is made of tightly fitted flagstones.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

For each round of movement, there is a 25% chance that an exploding flagstone will be stepped on. Flagstone (3d6 damage plus 1d6 bleed damage, DC 22 Reflex save for half damage and no bleed damage); multiple targets (all targets within 20')

item.title: Weed Eater Doorknob (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorknob is recessed into the door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

A very thin razor wire spins rapidly in the recessed area.  Razor Wire (+18 vs AC or take 1d6 damage plus 1d6 Dex damage)

item.title: Suggestion Box (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A locked wooden box hangs on the wall, with a small slot for inserting objects.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device 31

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

If a PC examines the box, they will see the glint of gold just visible inside the slot. This also triggers the trap. Suggestion (DC 25 Will save or deposit all of your coins in the box and leave the room); multiple targets (all targets within 30'). Once the last person leaves the room, the box vanishes.

item.title: Immunity Fountain (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Healing water bubbles up from the fountain.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

The water radiates healing magic, and if imbibed, the target cures 1d8 points of damage. However, it also has another effect. Immunity (DC 21 Will save or become immune to the effects of cure light, moderate, serious and critical wounds spells and effects for 70 minutes)

item.title: Out of Tune Player Piano (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A player piano pumps out a jaunty tune.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If a PC gets within 10' of the piano, it begins to play a discordant melody. Melody (DC 24 Will save or have a 50% chance of attacking the nearest creature for 9 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within 20')

item.title: Tiny Door (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A solid wooden 3' high door is at the end of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the door is opened, everyone shrinks. Shrink (DC 22 Fortitude save or be affected per the reduce person spell); multiple targets (up to 7 targets within 30')

item.title: Crackling Torches (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The torches here flicker wildly; pieces of ash drift from a few of them.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 18

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

Embers float from the torches and land on PCs. During each movement phase, there is a 50% chance that an ember will land on a PC. Ember (DC 18 Reflex save or take 1d2 fire damage per round and gain the shaken condition. A standard action removes the ember); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Poisoned Crenellations (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Crenellations top this 20' high stone wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The crenellations have had a poison applied to them in such a way that if a PC latches onto them with a grappling hook, poison begins to run down the hook and down the rope or chain at the rate of 10' per round. Poison (DC 20 Fort Save or lose 1d6 Str per round for 6 rounds, 2 Saves needed to cure)

item.title: Beauty is in the Eye of the Beholder (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large portrait of a beholder, framed with a solid gold frame, dominates this small study.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone tries to take the frame, one of the eyes on the beholder flashes. Beholder Eye (DC 22 Will Save or target's Charisma and Intelligence scores drop to 1, arcane spell casters take -4 to save, as the feeblemind spell)

item.title: Mandolin Slide Stairs (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A set of smooth metal stairs descends downwards.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 23

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

When a target gets 20' down the stairs, they turn into a slide. However, the stair edges are sharp, and not quite flush. Stairs (6d6 damage + 1d6 bleed damage, DC 22 Reflex save for half damage and no bleed damage); multiple targets (all targets on stairs)

item.title: Air Injection (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small, iron-bound chest sits in the corner of this room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

A small needle is attached to an air pump, and injects a large amount of air into the target. Injection (DC 19 Reflex save avoids, otherwise, DC 21 Fortitude Save or take 2d6 Con damage)

item.title: Old Brick Wall (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A door is set into an old brick wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

The door is supporting the wall, if it is opened, the wall collapses. Wall (DC 18 Reflex save or take 2d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets within 10' of wall)

item.title: Uneven Carpet (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The carpet here is old and worn.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 16; Disable Device 16

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Anyone walking on the carpet can trip. Trip (DC 12 Acrobatics check per movement or trip)

item.title: Studded Floor (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The stone tiles on the floor are covered in small, sharp studs.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Several of the tiles tilt when stepped on. Studded Tile (DC 21 Reflex save or take 1d6 bleed damage and fall prone)

item.title: Bubble Wrap Floor (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor has warped, leaving many bubbles.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 26

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

It requires a DC 18 Acrobatics check per move action to not step on a bubble. If a bubble is stepped on, it makes a very loud noise.

item.title: Hostile Spellbook (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A spellbook sits on the desk.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger visual; Reset None

Effect

When the spellbook is opened, whoever begins to read it becomes a target for the next round of combat. (DC 16 Will Save negates)

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: More of a one-shot protection thingy.
So this is more like a cursed item? I ask because the way it reads, you aren't attacked by the book, you just become the choice target of everything else you fight.

item.title: Mirrored (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A fancy mirror is at the end of the hall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

When a PC gets within 10 feet of the mirror, the mirror shatters; he and the next PC become linked. The next time either one of them takes damage from an attack, the damage is split evenly between the two of them, DC 16 Will save negates.

item.title: Qualm Before the Storm (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A painting of a ship at sea is at the end of the hall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger proximity; Reset 1 day

Effect

When a target gets within 10' of the painting, it animates. The calm sea becomes a raging one, tossing the ship about. Qualm (DC 18 Will save or take -10 on all ability, skill and concentration checks for 3 minutes, or until 1 round is spent doing nothing)

item.title: Twisted Carpet (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The carpet's patterns are dizzying and seem to be in motion.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If one of the patterns is stepped on while in motion (DC 18 Acrobatics check to avoid) then the target's is twisted. Twisted Carpet (DC 18 Will save or target's next melee attack affects a random target)

item.title: Spinning Room (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The room is a large cylinder.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device 22

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

When someone gets within 10' of the opposite door, the room begins to rotate quickly, and spikes protrude from the walls. Spinning Room (Each round, target must make a DC 16 Acrobatics check or be thrown against the wall. If the save is made, each successive round's DC is at +2. When thrown against the wall, the target takes 1d6 damage, and an additional 3d6 damage if a +12 melee attack succeeds); multiple targets (all targets in room) The room spins for 1d6+1 rounds.

item.title: Stat Check (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A fountain pours out glowing water. A small sign says, "Drink from me, and you shall be enriched".

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

Anyone who drinks from the fountain must make a DC 18 Fortitude Save. If they fail, all of their stats are increased by 4. However, the first time a combat or skill check happens, it turns out that the PC's stats were actually decreased by 4. This adjustment lasts 1 hour.

item.title: Acid Rain (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The tree leaves provide shelter from the elements.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

1d4 rounds after it starts to rain, the leaves interact with the water, misting the area in acid. Acid (6d6 acid damage, DC 21 Fortitude save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in a 30' radius)

item.title: Iron Isaac Newton (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large apple tree stands in the middle of the field, covered in golden apples.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device 21

Trigger proximity; Reset Auto

Effect

When anyone walks under the tree, one of the apples falls off the tree. Apple (DC 18 Reflex save or take 1d6 damage) Each apple actually is made of iron, and has a thin gold coating. There are 1d8 of them, each worth 1gp.

item.title: Grease Fire (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several skillets of hot grease are cooking atop the stoves in this kitchen.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 21

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

If a PC gets within 10' of a stovetop, he triggers the sprinklers in the room. Sprinklers (DC 19 Reflex save or take 2d6 fire damage). Additionally, the entire room is set on fire. Anyone in the room takes 1d6 fire damage per round. Also, the floor of the room is affected by the equivalent of a grease spell.

item.title: Ladder Pit (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A 20' ladder leads up to a trapdoor in the ceiling.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset touch

Effect

When the trapdoor is opened, a 30' pit opens up underneath the ladder, which shatters on impact. Additionally, the trap door falls as well. Ladder Pit (DC 21 Reflex Save or fall. If save failed, PC can make a secondary DC 24 Reflex Save. If both fail, PC falls 50', taking 5d6 damage. If the 2nd succeeds, PC only falls 20', taking 2d6 damage. Then DC 19 Reflex save or take an additional 1d6 damage from trap door)

item.title: Greasy Tiles (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A long, tiled corridor stretches out before you.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 22

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Anyone that moves down that hall at a rate faster than a single, normal movement will set off one of the tile traps. Greasy Tile (DC 19 Reflex Save or square that target is in is affected as by the grease spell)

item.title: Potholes (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several debris filled holes litter the floor.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 16; Disable Device 16

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

For each movement action, a DC 16 Acrobatics check is required to avoid a pothole. Pothole (DC 17 Reflex save or twist and ankle in the debris. Speed is limited to half until target receives either magical healing, or a DC 15 Heal check succeeds)

item.title: Web Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door at the end of the hall looks dusty.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The door is made from thin wood, and filled with sticky web material. Breaking it or opening it causes the wood to fall away, and the web explodes outwards. Web Door (20' radius affected by the web spell, DC 18 Reflex negates, DC 18 for CM or Escape Artist)

item.title: Exhausting Stairs (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A worn stairway heads up.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

Anyone traversing the stairs becomes exhausted. Stairs (target gains the exhausted condition, DC 21 Fortitude Save reduces this to fatigued)

item.title: Tome of Knowledge (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An arcane tome rests on a lectern.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Any spellcaster who examines the tome is compelled to read it. Tome (DC 21 Will save or read the tome. Each round, a random, prepared spell or spell slot is lost. A new save can be made at the start of each round to stop reading. The duration ends when the target has no more spells or unused spell slots remaining)

item.title: Vulnerability Mist (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Mist swirls about in these caves.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Anyone that steps into the mist is affected. Mist (DC 19 Fortitude save, or foes are treated as if they have DR 3 against melee attacks by the target, lasts for 3 hours)

item.title: Fireman's Pole (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A pole runs through a hole in the floor, offering an easy way down.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 21

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If anyone slides down the pole, it immediately becomes very hot. Pole (DC 22 Reflex save or fall, taking 3d6 points of damage, if successful, target takes 1d6 points of fire damage per round if he does not let go, it takes 2 full rounds to slide down the pole)

item.title: Waxed Spot (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is made of old, worn wood planks.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device 17

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

A spot on the floor has been waxed and is slippery. Characters that move through that square must make a DC 15 Acrobatics check or fall prone.

item.title: Simmer Floor (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor of this room is shiny.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 22

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The floor is covered in oil which turns up to a simmer in 2 rounds. Simmer Floor (DC 18 Acrobatics check of fall on floor, where target takes 1d6 fire damage per round. It requires another DC 18 Acrobatics check to stand up, and each move action requires a DC 18 Acrobatics check, or target falls prone. Otherwise, prone characters can crawl 5 feet per round); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Bleed Tiles (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is made up of red tiles.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

PC's that stabilize while in contact with the floor resume dying. Bleed Tiles (DC 10 Will save or resume dying when first stabilized)

item.title: Fatigue Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A worn wooden door leads to the next room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Once a target touches the door, he becomes fatigued. Fatigue Door (DC 10 Fortitude save or become fatigued for 1d4 rounds)

item.title: Dazey Dukes (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The painting ahead depicts a stunning woman wearing shorts.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

When a target gets within 10' of the painting, they are dazed (as spell). Daze (DC 10 Will save or become dazed for 1 round)

item.title: Trampoline Door (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sturdy door is at the end of the corridor.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 21

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

If someone tries to bash the door down, it collapses and exposes a trampoline, while at the same time, a spiked wall slides down from behind. Trampoline door (DC 22 Reflex save or take 4d6 damage + 6 bleed damage)

item.title: Impact Glue Door (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door at the end of the hallway looks sturdy.

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device 34

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone strikes the door with force, the glue covered on it activates immediately, bonding as if affected by sovereign glue.

item.title: Telescope (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large telescope points out the window.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 17

Trigger visual; Reset repair

Effect

If anyone removes the cap and looks through the eyepiece, they look at a very bright celestial object, which blinds them. Telescope (DC 18 reflex save or become blinded for 1d4 days)

item.title: Rolling Boulder Corridor (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A boulder begins to roll down the corridor, straight at you!

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 22

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

A boulder, 10' away, begins rolling at the party at a rate of 40' per round. Just ahead, is a doorway to a stone tower. Boulder (4d6 damage, DC 24 Reflex save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in hallway that the boulder occupies same space, which is 5x5). However, once the boulder strikes the doorway, it collapses the tower. Tower Collapse (10d6 damage and knocked prone, DC 24 Reflex save for half damage and avoids prone); multiple targets (all targets in tower). Terrain becomes difficult terrain after collapse.

item.title: Magic Missile Lock (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornate lock is on this gilded chest.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the trap is activated (by opening the chest) 5 magic missiles strike random targets, each doing 1d4+1 points of damage.

item.title: Cold Wine Carafe (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A carafe of chilled wine sits on a table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the wine is picked up, it strikes the target with a cold ray of frost. Ray of Frost (+0 ranged touch attack for 1d3 cold damage)

item.title: Sap Trap (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The hallway ahead is narrow and ends in a tiny door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset Reset

Effect

When the door is opened, sticky sap pours down from the ceiling. Sap (DC 22 Reflex save or become covered in sticky sap, which reduces Dex by 4 until it is cleaned off. Cleaning off takes 1 hour)

item.title: Pollen (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A fine yellow dust covers everything.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Anyone that wanders through the area breathes in pollen. Pollen (DC 18 Fortitude save or become exhausted next time the target engages in an activity more strenuous then walking; combat, acrobatics check, running, etc); multiple targets (all targets in area)

item.title: Facade (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A tall building stands before you.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

A facade has been attached to the real wall. Attempts to scale the wall, either manually or with a grappling hook, cause it to fall. Facade (DC 19 Reflex save or fall, taking 2d6 damage)

item.title: Dragon Pistol Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A door is in the far wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the door is opened, a pistol fires. Pistol (+8 ranged touch for 1d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets in 15' cone)

item.title: Black Powder Carpet (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A plush carpet runs the length of the hall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 21

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

When the PC's get about halfway down the carpet, the ends ignite and burn towards the middle, where it reaches a patch of carpet made from black powder 1 round later. Black powder (6d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Dimensionally Barricaded Door (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door at the end of the hallway has been barricaded and boarded shut.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Any attacks on the door pass through the door and hit the attacker.

item.title: Bungle Booze (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A well appointed liquor cabinet stands at the far end of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

The first target to touch any of the liquor bottles is bungled. Bungle (DC 11 Will save or take a -20 penalty on next attack roll or skill check)

item.title: Sickening Brazier (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A brightly burning brazier is emitting noxious fumes.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Anyone within 30' of the brazier automatically gains the sickened condition. If the brazier is extinguished, the sickened effect goes away, however, the entire room is filled with thick, heavy ash, blocking all sight (even darkvision) and making the entire area difficult terrain.

item.title: Bridge Over Boiling Oil (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sturdy bridge crosses a pool of popping oil

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device 27

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

Halfway across the bridge, the trap causes the bottom of the bridge to open up, dumping hundreds of gallons of water into the boiling oil. Oil (10d6 fire damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets on bridge)

item.title: Magic Mouth Sentry (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large mouth has been painted on the door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the door is opened, the mouth screams loudly for 1 round, alerting any creatures with 180'.

item.title: Relaxing Chair (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A comfortable looking chair beckons you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

The first person to get within 30 feet of the chair feels an overwhelming urge to sit in the chair. Chair (DC 13 Will Save or suffer a -4 penalty to initiative checks and reflex saves for 3 minutes)

item.title: Wind Chimes (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A set of wind chimes hangs from the ceiling.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Once in the room, if a door is opened, a small gust of wind shakes the chimes, setting up a magical vibration effect. Chimes (DC 13 Fortitude Save or become sickened for 3 rounds); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Gooey Peepholes (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Two holes have been drilled into the wall, presumably allowing a view of the neighboring room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The holes look over what appears to be a meeting room. However, when looked thru, they shoot a sticky substance into the face of the looker. Gooey Peepholes (DC 18 Reflex save or become blinded and gain suffocating condition). It requires 2d6 rounds to fully remove the goo from one's face.

item.title: Shrinking Pool (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A deep pool of water blocks the way.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

Anyone who enters the water shrinks to the next size lower as per the reduce person spell. Reduce Person (DC 16 Fortitude save or shrink)

item.title: Volatile Barrels (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several barrels are stacked against the wall, blocking a door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 21

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the barrels are disturbed, the contents, which are under pressure, will explode, causing a chain reaction. Barrels (6d6 damage, DC 19 Reflex save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Flash Heat (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sturdy door is placed in the wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 23

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

When the door is opened, a gust of superheated air escapes. Flash Heat (2d6 fire damage, DC 18 Fortitude Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in 30' cone)

item.title: Spring Loaded Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The room is sealed by a solid metal, spiked door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the door is opened, a spring behind it pushes the door out violently. Spring Door (+18 vs. CMD for 2d6 damage plus 1d6 bleed damage, plus target is pushed back 20' and knocked prone)

item.title: Glass Door (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A wooden door is stuck in the frame.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The door is a pane of glass protected by an illusion. If it is forced open or struck, the glass explodes, sending shards everywhere. Glass Door (1d6 bleed damage, DC 19 Reflex for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 10')

item.title: Juxtaposition (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small, expensive looking piece of jewelry sits behind bars, just out of reach.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If the item is touched, even magically, the target touching it switches places with the jewelry. Juxtaposition (DC 22 Will save or target swaps places with jewelry)

item.title: Negotiation Chair (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several plush chairs surround the negotiation table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

One of the chairs has been enchanted to make one of the people sitting in it less diplomatic. Chair (DC 15 Will save or target takes a -2 penalty to diplomacy checks for 1 hour)

item.title: Calcifying Statue (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A statue stands next to a door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

If anyone moves in front of the door, the statue reaches out and turns the target to stone. Statue (+14 vs. CMD to hold target, each round the target takes 1d4 Dex damage, and is slowed for 1 round, DC 21 Fortitude save negates slow. It requires CMB or Escape Artist vs. DC 24 to escape);

item.title: Confessional Portal (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sealed stone door blocks the way.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger proximity; Reset auto

Effect

When a PC gets within 5 feet of the door, the door will ask a very personal and/or incriminating question, which must be answered truthfully for the door to open, and to avoid bad effects. Confessional Portal (if answered untruthfully, 3d6 damage plus sickened for 2d4 rounds, DC 18 Will save negates sickened effect)

item.title: Church Key Door (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sturdy door protects this residence.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 21

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

If someone opens the door, and large church key comes out, breaking the armor of the target. Church Key (+18 vs. AC to give armor the broken condition, if the target is not wearing armor, it deals 4d12+8 damage instead)

item.title: Revenge of the Grave (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The main crypt houses the most important nobles.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device 32

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone disturbs one of the crypts, a ghostly image seeks revenge. Revenge (DC 25 Will save negates, if fails, target takes 130 points of damage, DC 25 Fortitude for only 5d6+13 damage)

item.title: Abacus Lock (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An abacus is inset into the stone door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

In order to open the door, a specific number must be displayed on the abacus. Any other number damages the target. Abacus Lock (DC 22 Fortitude Save or take damage equal to the number on the abacus, up to 5d8 + 9)

item.title: Pain Door (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorknob glows slightly.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If the door is touched, racking pain courses through the target's body. Pain (DC 19 Fortitude save or take 1d6 damage each round and become sickened for 5 rounds)

item.title: Blow Me a Kiss (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A statue of a lady is at the end of the hall. She has lace covering her modest bits and is holding a beautiful gem.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone removes the lace or takes the gem, she blows a kiss at them. Kiss (DC 22 Will save or have a magic mouth permanently attached to target. Magic mouth will randomly make sexually suggestive comments to people nearby, and sometimes for no reason at all. This imparts a -4 penalty to stealth, diplomacy, intimidate and bluff checks, can be removed with dispel magic, CL 9 or remove curse)

item.title: Pun Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A huge mouth protrudes from the door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

When the characters get within 10' of the door, the mouth starts speaking once per round, making good door puns. The only way to stop it and open it is to reply with a better pun. Pun Door (DC 18 Will Save or closest non-laughing target collapses prone into laughter for 3 rounds, and can take no actions; this happens once each round)

item.title: Untying Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorframe is decorated with tiny frescoes of hands.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The little hands grab onto and untie a shoelace, purse string, or other tied object. Untying Door (DC 16 Reflex Save or one object becomes untied and drops)

item.title: Nightmare Crystal Ball (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A crystal ball sits in a golden holder on a small, round table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

If anyone gets within 5 feet of the crystal ball and looks into it, they see a horrific vision of their worst fears that affects them like a nightmare spell. Crystal Ball (DC 22 Will Save or suffer from a nightmare which leaves the target fatigued and unable to recover arcane spells for 24 hours)

item.title: Bar and Spike (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The long hallway has a wooden floor and a low ceiling.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

When a character moves down the hallway, a small bar shoots out, tripping the target. However, if they jump over it, they hit the spike that has lowered from the ceiling. Bar and Spike (DC 17 Reflex Save or be knocked prone, if successful, DC 22 Reflex save or take 1d6 damage +1 bleed damage from spike)

item.title: Blunderbuss Spray (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several small vents surround the door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

If anyone attempts to open the door, 4 vents fire a spray of pellets. Spray (4 attacks at +8 ranged melee vs. touch AC for 1d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets in 15' cone)

item.title: Shaky Stairs (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A rickety set of stairs spirals downwards.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If more than 2 PC's are on the stairs at any time, they collapse. Shaky Stairs (DC 18 Reflex save or fall for 2d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets on staircase)

item.title: Door Stop (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door has a reinforced stop that can be raised to open the door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 17

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the doorstop is raised, a hammer strokes. Hammertime! (+8 melee for 1d8 damage)

item.title: Lava Streams (CR 15)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large, jeweled idol sits on a pedestal in the center of this flagstone room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device 33

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the idol is lifted, six streams of lava shoot out of the walls. Lava (18d6 damage, DC 31 Reflex save for half damage)

item.title: Powder Kegs (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several barrels are stacked in the corner.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 21

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

When the opposite door is opened, the barrels, which are full of gunpowder, explode. Powder Kegs (10d6 damage, DC 27 Reflex for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 60')

item.title: Fountain Door (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small fountain is set into one of the walls.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 28

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The fountain hides a secret door, whose mechanism is at the bottom of the fountain. The water in the fountain has been treated with a substance that paralyzes. If the lever is improperly used, however, the fluid gushes to the floor. Fountain (DC 18 Fortitude Save or become paralyzed for 1d3 hours); multiple targets (all targets within 15'). Note that any direct skin contact with the liquid in the fountain also triggers the paralyzation effect on the character coming into contact.

item.title: Barrel in the Ceiling (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door seems to open inwards. It's dark above.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 18

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

When the door is opened, a hollow barrel falls straight down over the target. Barrel (DC 18 Reflex save or become pinned, DC 18 Escape artist or CMB check to escape)

item.title: Earworm (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A catchy little tune can be heard from the room ahead.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Those that enter the room are infected with an earworm. Earworm (spellcasters must make concentration checks when casting spells at -2, -2 to all mind-affecting saves for 1d4 hours); multiple targets (all targets within 60')

item.title: Glitterbomb (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door looks locked and sturdy.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If anyone goes through the door, they are inundated with glitter, which outlines them in a sparkly aura and also chokes them. Glitterbomb (DC 16 Reflex save or gain a sparkly aura which negates invisibility and gives a +2 bonus to opponents to hit, and also nauseates for 1 round unless a DC 16 Fortitude save is made); multiple targets (all targets in 15' radius)

item.title: Switchblade Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large button is in the middle of the door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

If the button is pushed, the door opens, but a spring loaded blade flashes out and in. Switchblade (+8 melee for 1d4+1 damage)

item.title: Mousetrap Door (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This wooden door is reinforced with iron bands.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 24

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

If the door is open, a huge metal bar swings down. Mousetrap (DC 22 Reflex save or take 1d10 damage plus become pinned against door, requiring DC 22 Escape Artist or CMB check to escape)

item.title: Barrel and Collapsing Floor (CR 3 or CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A barrel plummets towards you from above.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 23

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

The barrel falls from the ceiling. Barrel (DC 19 Reflex save or take 1d6 damage). If the reflex save succeeds, the barrel instead strikes the floor, collapsing it into an acid pit. Collapsing Floor (DC 22 Reflex save or fall 20' into an acid pit. While in pit, targets take 1d6 acid damage per round. While in the space between pit and floor, targets take 1d2 acid damage per round. This damage extends to objects, such as ropes and chains used to help characters escape. The walls are 20' to the floor, and require a DC 25 Climb check to ascend.) multiple targets (all targets within 20' of barrel impact)

item.title: Bent Board (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door seems warped and stuck in the doorway.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

A few of the boards are severely warped and bent. When the door is forced open (DC 25 Break) the boards spring straight, striking anyone within 5'. Bent Board (DC 19 Reflex save or take 2d6 damage)

item.title: Anti-Magic Glass (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The only visible entrances to the tower are some small windows, very high up.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device 31

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The windows are protected by an anti-magic field. Anti-Magic windows (all of target's magical effects are suppressed for 1d4 rounds after touching field)

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Or possibly "after passing through the window". Anti-magic doors might be a *much* cheaper option than a full anti-magic field. Perhaps the effect might be 1d4 minutes, or a Will save for 1d4 rounds.
Radiates strong abjuration, of course. No SR.
Plenty of scope for special keys or wardstones that allow you to pass without the effect.

item.title: Chest Full of Nails (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A solid oak chest, reinforced with iron, sits locked in the back of the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device 23

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

If the chest is opened, hundreds of nails explode from it in a shower of death. Chest of Nails (10d6 damage plus 2d6 bleed damage, DC 24 Reflex save for half damage and negate bleed damage); multiple targets (all targets in 30' radius)

item.title: Disguised Glass Door (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A stout wooden door is stuck in its frame.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

The door is stuck and requires a DC 25 Break check to open. However, it is made of cleverly disguised glass. If the break check succeeds, the door shatters. Shattered door (+16 melee for 4d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Alcohol Soaked Floor (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The wooden floor seems very damp.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 24

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

The floor has been soaked in an odorless alcohol. Any flame that comes into contact with the floor ignites the entire area. Ignited floor (1d6 fire damage per round); multiple targets (all targets on floor)

item.title: Itch and Rust (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A thick cloud of powder descends on you from above. A refreshing pool nearby offers relief.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 23

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Powder falls from above, causing intense itching. Powder (DC 14 Fortitude save or become nauseated until armor/clothes are removed, then sickened until washed off); multiple targets (all targets within 60'). The pool nearby offers relief. The pool will not harm flesh, but all metal put into the pool must make a DC 16 Fortitude save or gain the broken condition from immediate rust.

item.title: Icy Prison Falls (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A river, shallow enough to ford, is about 20 feet below you. Downriver a ways, you can hear what appears to be a waterfall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

A target which enters the water becomes encased in ice and floats down the river towards the falls. Ice (become trapped in 5 inches of ice, which has 15 HP, DC 22 Reflex save or also be helpless, otherwise entangled. Each round target takes 1d3 cold damage. In 5 rounds, target floats over waterfall, where ice is broken up on impact, but target takes 8d6 falling damage)

item.title: Spell Sucker (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Something doesn't feel right here.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device 32

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset None

Effect

When this spell goes off, it removes spells from casters. Spell Sucker (DC 27 Will save or lose highest level spell or spell slot); multiple targets (all targets in 20' burst)

item.title: Mountain of Pellets (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An avalanche of pellets comes rolling down the hall, towards a hole in the floor!

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device 24

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

The pellets roll down the hall at 40' per round and are size large. Pellets (anyone in same square as pellets takes 1d10 damage per round. Pellets attack at +22 CMB and grapple the target(s). Grappled targets move with the pellets, requiring a DC 32 Escape Artist or CMD check to escape. Once the pellets reach the hole they fall in, dealing an additional 1d10 damage to trapped targets. They heat up on the bottom for one round, dealing and additional 1d6 fire damage, then fire explosively out of the hole, dealing 4d10 additional damage to each grappled target); multiple targets (all targets in 10' square)

item.title: Pinecone Grenades (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several trees are laden with overlarge pinecones.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 19

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset None

Effect

Pinecones fall from the trees and explode, sending sharp shrapnel everywhere. Pinecones (1d6 damage + 1d3 bleed damage, DC 18 Reflex save for half damage and negate bleed damage); multiple targets (all targets within 20' of pinecone)

item.title: Sharp Latched Door Handle (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door handle is operated by a pull-in latch.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 17; Disable Device 17

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

If the latch is pulled, it reveals a sharp blade. Latch (DC 16 Reflex save or take 1d4+1 damage)

item.title: Dimension Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The air around the door seems to sparkle.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Anyone that walks thru the door is either increased or reduced in size when they pass through. Dimension Door (DC 16 Fortitude Save or become 1 size larger or smaller, 50% chance)

item.title: Saddle Horse (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is made of evenly spaced flagstones.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 18

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

The two sides of the floor collapse, leaving a thin strip of floor that the PC straddles. Saddle Horse (DC 17 Reflex save or PC takes 1d4 damage, falls prone, and becomes nauseated for 2d4 rounds)

item.title: Skewer Pipes (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small pipe, big enough to crawl through, leads out of the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 24

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

When the target gets about 40' down the pipe, a long, spiral skewer shoots out. Skewer (DC 22 Reflex save or take 1d6 bleed damage and become entangled and pinned, requiring a DC 22 Escape Artist or CMD check to escape. Escaping also deals an additional 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Fountain Firework (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A tube ahead lights up, spraying pretty lights upward.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

The tube shoots several round bolts of light in the air, which then turn to strike the party. Fireworks (1d4+1 damage once per round for 2d10 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within line of effect)

item.title: Tacky Stairs (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A set of stone stairs leads downwards.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 18

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

About halfway down the stairs, a bunch of tacks cascade down the stairway. Tacks (DC 18 Reflex save or fall prone, taking 1d4 damage plus 1 bleed damage); multiple targets (all targets on stairway)

item.title: Arrow in the Back (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door is in the side of this narrow corridor.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

When the door is opened, an arrow shoots out, hitting the target in the back. Arrow (+12 ranged melee for 1d8 +2d6 precision damage)

item.title: Water Pipes (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Copper pipes run overhead.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 17

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

The pipes are fragile, and motion nears them causes the hot water pipe to break. Hot Water Pipe (2d6 fire damage, DC 18 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 5' take 1 point of splash damage)

item.title: Candelabra Chandelier (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large chandelier is hung from the ceiling sporting several lit candles.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 24

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

If anyone moves within 10' of the center of the room (where the chandelier is centered), it falls down, crashing into the ground and then exploding. Falling Chandelier (DC 22 Reflex Save or take 3d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30' of room center); Exploding Chandelier (4d6 damage, DC 24 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30' of room center)

item.title: Break Me Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sturdy, locked door is stuck in place.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If an item is used to break open the door, it breaks. Break me door (DC 16 Fortitude Save or item gains broken condition)

item.title: Door Fetish (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An elaborate fetish adorns the door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If anyone opens the door, the fetish howls, wracking those nearby with pain. Fetish (DC 22 Fortitude Save or take 1d6 nonlethal damage per round for 9 rounds and target gains sickened condition); multiple targets (all targets within 60').

item.title: Fire Eyed Portrait (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A portrait with lifeless eyes hangs on the far wall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone touches any valuable item in the room, the portrait's eyes turn a bright red, emitting a burning ray. Burning Ray (DC 18 Fortitude save or take 1d6 fire damage, which requires another DC 18 Reflex save or also catch on fire, taking an additional 1d6 fire damage per round. A new reflex save may be made every round. The attack lasts for 3 rounds)

item.title: Ever Locking Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door ahead is locked.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

The door is locked (DC 25 Disable Device). Once unlocked, it remains unlocked for 1 turn, but the target forgets that they unlocked it. Ever Locking Door (DC 16 Will save or target forgets they unlocked the door)

item.title: Smashing Portcullis (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A portcullis bars the way.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device 22

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

When the portcullis is opened, once it reaches the top, the floor on both sides folds up into each other. Smashing Portcullis (DC 23 Reflex Save or take 6d6 crushing damage, and 2d6 crushing damage each turn. A DC 23 Strength, CMB or Escape Artist check is required to escape); multiple targets (all targets within 10' of portcullis)

item.title: Slippery Alley (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This alleyway's road surface is very smooth, and 2 drainage gutters are on each side.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 21

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

The roadway is very slippery, treat as difficult terrain, and PCs must make a DC 18 Acrobatics check on each movement action or fall prone. The gutters can be traversed, however, every 1d4 rounds, raw sewage flows down them. Gutters (DC 18 Reflex Save or get hit by sewage - DC 14 Fortitude Save or contract Filth Fever in 1d4 days); multiple targets (all targets in gutters)

item.title: Don't Eat That (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A tantalizing feast is before you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

The feast is fake. If touched, it ruins the targets food. Don't Eat That (DC 11 Will Save or all of target's food and water becomes inedible)

item.title: Enticing Cuffs (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An open set of manacles lays on a velvet cushion.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

When a target approaches the pillow, he feels a desire to drop everything and don the cuffs. Cuffs (DC 11 Will Save or target puts on cuffs, locking them. There is no key, so they must be removed as if they were masterwork manacles)

item.title: Fake Feast (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A savory feast is before you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

Any target that gets within 25' becomes afflicted with terrible hunger. Fake Feast (DC 13 Fortitude Save or target becomes afflicted with hunger for 6 days as per the Feast of Ashes spell)

item.title: Thirst Goblet (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A jeweled goblet is on the table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Anyone that touches the goblet becomes unnaturally thirsty. Thirst Goblet (DC 14 Fortitude Save or suffer the effects of Cup of Dust for 5 days)

item.title: Star Alarm (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This office is neat and tidy, but somewhat full of interesting items and papers.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone touches any of the items or scrolls, they are affected as per the wandering star motes spell. Wandering Star Motes (DC 16 Will save, lasts for 7 rounds)

item.title: Pain Shrine (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A shrine has been erected here. Several coins and other small valuables have been left behind.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone disturbs the shrine, the target(s) are affected by the mass pain strike spell. Mass Pain Strike (DC 17 Fortitude save, up to 9 creatures for 9 rounds)

item.title: Icy Teleport Bomb (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The ceiling here is 30 feet high.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device 31

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

When the trap is triggered, the target is encased in 11 inches of ice and teleported 30 ft in the air, where he then falls. Icy Teleport Bomb (DC 24 Will Save or be encased in ice and teleported 30 feet up, falling taking 3d6 damage, all others must make a DC 24 Reflex save or take 2d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30' of falling block of ice)

item.title: Windy Corridor (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The party enters a long, dusty corridor.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device 32

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

About halfway down the corridor, the wind begins to blow violently. Wind (A 20' radius windstorm, centered on the target and moving with it up to 30' per round deals 3d6 damage per round for 13 rounds. Additionally, the area is considered a windstorm for weather effects)

item.title: Ice Guard (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Set on a pedestal before you are the crown jewels.

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device 34

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the jewels are touched, the entire area is affected as by the polar midnight spell. Polar Midnight (DC 23 Fortitude save, effect lasts for 17 rounds, it also takes a full round action to remove the jewels)

item.title: Utter Failure (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several fragile and valuable writings are archived here.

Type: magical; Perception DC 33; Disable Device 33

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Unless a DC 45 Knowledge (Engineering) check is made, the writings crumble into dust when touched, triggering the trap which is a prediction of failure spell effect for each individual writing. Prediction of Failure (DC 22 Will save to reduce duration from permanent to 15 rounds)

item.title: Acid Alarm (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A set of nice silverware sits on the table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset None

Effect

If the silverware is removed from the table, acid splashes down on the target. Acid (+8 ranged melee for 1d3 acid damage)

item.title: Self Locking Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornate door leads out of the chamber.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If anyone tries to open the door without knocking, it is held secure by a hold portal spell, increasing the DC of opening it by 5.

item.title: Joke Spellbook (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A spellbook lies on the table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the spellbook is touched, the target begins laughing uncontrollably. Joke Spellbook (DC 18 Will save or fall prone laughing for 3 rounds. A new save can be made each round as a full round action)

item.title: Nauseating Carafe (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A carafe filled with wine sits on the table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

When the carafe is opened, a noxious cloud of vapor emerges. Carafe (DC 19 Fortitude save while in cloud or become nauseated); multiple targets (all targets within 20' of carafe, cloud increases by 20' each round for 5 rounds then dissipates)

item.title: Don't Listen at Me Door (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small wooden door leads to the bedroom.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If anyone listens at the door, it emits a loud shriek. Shriek (5d6 damage plus deafened for 2d6 rounds, DC 21 Fortitude save for half damage and negates deafness); multiple targets (all targets in 30' cone)

item.title: Stone Door (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A wooden door is set into the stone wall, a small room is beyond.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If anyone walks through the doorway, a wall of stone forms behind them. Wall of Stone (DC 22 Reflex save to avoid being trapped. Wall is 2 inches thick)

item.title: Can't Open the Door (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The room begins to fill up with water!

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device 31

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The room quickly fills up with water, and there is only one exit through a door, however, the door repulses any who try to go through it. Door (DC 24 Will save or be unable to get closer than 10' to the door for 11 rounds)

item.title: What Sword? (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The archway is decorated with two statues of mermaids.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device 32

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If anyone moved through the archway, one of the mermaids reaches out and touches an item the PC carries (sword, wand, etc) and teleports it away. Teleport (DC 25 Will save or object is teleported to the ethereal plane as per teleport object spell)

item.title: Bright Gem (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large gem is inset into the middle of an intricate mosaic.

Type: magical; Perception DC 33; Disable Device 33

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the gem is touched, it emits a bright light, as per the sunburst spell with a Reflex save DC of 27.

item.title: Dragon Statue (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A mighty dragon statue stands in splendor.

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device 34

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

Once the party is within 100' of the statue, they want to bow down and treat the dragon as a god as per the overwhelming presence spell, with a Will Save DC of 28 and a duration of  17 rounds.

item.title: Bleeding Ground (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is stained in blood.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

Any creature lying on the ground with negative hit points and stabalized must make a DC 10 Will save or resume dying.

item.title: Negative Energy Door Knob (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A doorknob, intricately carved in images of death, is inset into the door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

The doorknob channels negative energy into the target. Doorknob (1d8+1 negative energy damage, DC 10 Will save for half damage)

item.title: Respect Me Idol (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A golden idol to an unknown god sits on the side of the hallway. A collection plate is in front.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger proximity; Reset auto

Effect

If anyone walks by the idol and does not either bow or make an offering, they are stuck fast. Idol (DC 16 Will save or become paralyzed, with a new save allowed each round as a full round action)

item.title: Curse Word (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Graffiti has been scrawled on the wall ahead.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger visual; Reset None

Effect

The graffiti is written in an ancient tongue. If read and understood, it is a curse word. Curse Word (+8 melee vs. touch and DC 19 Will save or take 6 points of Charisma damage)

item.title: Self Reflecting Mirror (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornately framed mirror stands at the end of the hall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger visual; Reset None

Effect

Anyone who gets within 25 feet of the mirror sees their reflection. Then they start to see their reflection re-enact every bad thing the PC has ever done, filling them with remorse. Remorse (DC 21 Will save or inflict 1d8+Str modifier damage to self every round for 7 rounds, otherwise, target can take no actions for 7 rounds, as he is frozen with sorrow, and takes a -2 penalty to AC)

item.title: Do Not Desecrate the Altar (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
At the end of this ceremonial hall is an altar, bedecked with valuables.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Anyone who removes a valuable off of the altar from this room is affected by the reprobation spell, with no save. Choose an appropriate faith. If there's a cleric in the party, choose his faith for fun.

item.title: Stay Out of Harm's Way (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large idol is set into the middle of an archway. You can probably squeeze past it. A mosaic has been painted above it on the wall that says, "Stay out of harm's way".

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device 31

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

Anyone moving past the idol must make a DC 24 Acrobatics check, or they touch the idol. Anyone touching the idol takes damage. Idol (110 points of damage, DC 24 Will save for half damage, cannot reduce to less than 1 hit point)

item.title: Evil Altar (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An altar to an evil god sits in the middle of the room, stained with blood.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device 32

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Anyone who attempts to destroy the altar causes it to emit a high shriek, resulting in the effect of the blasphemy spell being cast at CL 13 and DC 25 Will save.

item.title: No Tresspassing (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An old tower stands in the middle of a field. A sign says, "No Tresspassing"

Type: magical; Perception DC 33; Disable Device 33

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

If anyone moves to within 100' of the tower, the ground begins to shake as per the earthquake spell, centered on the party as if they were in open ground. The tower is not affected.

item.title: Guards (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The chapel is protected by a stone wall and gate.

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device 34

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If anyone breaches the gate, 1d4+2 wood golems appear and attack.

item.title: Kick Me Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door is stuck fast.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone breaks down the door, they get branded on the forehead with the words, "Kick Me". Brand (DC 10 Fortitude Save, or become branded as per the spell brand)

item.title: Attack Me Statue (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A statue stands in the middle of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

The PC's are ambushed near the statue. Once this happens, one of the PC's is compelled to attack the statue (30 hp, hardness 5) instead. Compel (DC 11 Will save or target attacks statue until destroyed)

item.title: Qualming Influence (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A book lies open on the table, it seems to be full of proverbs.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger visual; Reset None

Effect

If anyone reads the book, they become affected by the qualm spell with a DC 18 Will save.

item.title: Litany (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This seems to be an interrogation chamber, with writings on the walls.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger visual; Reset None

Effect

If anyone reads the writings, they become entangled by chains of energy from the floor. Entangled (DC 19 Will save or become entangled for one round)

item.title: Shackled! (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This small chamber has sturdy walls. Several valuable pieces of arcane equipment are neatly arranged on a lab bench.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone touches any of the equipment on the lab bench, shackles of force attach to the target's limbs, anchoring them to the back wall. Shackles (DC 21 Reflex save or become entangled, and unable to move more than 30' from the back wall for 7 minutes)

item.title: Shielded (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sturdy door is in front of you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

The first target through the door becomes magically connected to the room inside. While in that room, he shares damage taken by anyone in the room, reducing their damage by half and taking it himself. Shielded (DC 22 Will save or target takes half of all damage dealt while in room for 9 rounds)

item.title: Festering Fire Pits (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The ground cracks open and lava pours forth.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device 31

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Lava pours out of the ground. Lava (1d6 fire damage per round) and healing is suddenly difficult. Healing (DC 24 Fortitude save or target gains SR 23 against healing effects for 11 rounds, 1 round if save is successful); multiple targets (all targets within 30' of each other)

item.title: Spiky Mirror Corridor (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A grimy mirror is at the end of this treacherous corridor.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger visual; Reset Auto

Effect

The corridor is filled with spikes, and requires a DC 14 Acrobatics check for each movement action; those that fail take 1d3 points of damage. Once a PC is within 10' of the mirror, a flaming image of an armor clad warrior appears. Mirror Image (DC 11 Will Save or target is shaken for 1d4 rounds and also flees for 1d4 rounds back through corridor, suffering the -2 penalty on the Acrobatics checks)

item.title: Blind or Deaf Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A door is ahead with a large keyhole.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Depending on how a target examines the door, they become blind or deaf. Door (DC 18 Fortitude save or target is permanently blinded or deafened, depending on if target looked through or listened through keyhole)

item.title: Vampiric Door (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornate door leads into an office.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone touches any part of the door, they take damage. Vampiric Door (2d6 damage that is transferred to the office's occupant for 1 hour as temporary hit points)

item.title: Nap Time (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Sitting next to an overstuffed chair is a side table full of scrolls and tomes.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Anyone who sits down in the chair starts to become a little drowsy. Drowsy (DC 10 Will save or take a -5 penalty to perception checks and a -2 penalty to Will saves vs. sleep for 5 rounds)

item.title: Where's My Voice (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
