Lots of valuables are on the table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone disturbs the valuables, they are affected by a ventriloquism type spell. Ventriloquism (DC 11 Will save or target's voice is randomly projected 20' for 3 minutes, imparting a -2 penalty to all Charisma based checks)

item.title: Blurry Vision (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The lighting underground is strange.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The lights cause a blur effect. Blur (DC 13 Will save or target has a 20% miss chance when targeting); multiple targets (all targets in area)

item.title: Magical Mud (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A thin coat of mud coats the floor.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device 28

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

Anyone stepping in the mud is slowed. Slow (DC 14 Will save or target is staggered and also takes a -1 penalty on attack rolls, AC and reflex saves. Speed is also halved); multiple targets (all targets in mud)

item.title: Shouting Statue (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A statue with a large mouth stands in the way.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

If anyone gets within 30' of the statue, it yells. Shout (5d6 damage plus deafened for 2d6 rounds, DC 21 Fortitude save negates deafness and halves damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Fog (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A fog creeps into the hall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The fog causes the targets to have a weakened mental state. Fog (DC 22 Will save or suffer -10 to Will saves and Wisdom checks); multiple targets (all targets within fog)

item.title: Pull My Finger (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A single index finger is on the door, pointing at the party.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device 21

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The only way to open the door is to pull the finger. Finger Pull (Cloud of gas issues forth, DC 20 Fortitude save or become nauseated for 1d6 rounds, else become sickened for 1 round. After the cloud dissipates,  it is ignited, causing 3d6 damage, DC 18 Reflex save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 20')

item.title: Five Finger Discount (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorknob is recessed into the door itself.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 33; Disable Device 34

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

If the doorknob is turned, it becomes a whirling blade, slicing off fingers. Blade (+16 melee attack for 1d6 Dex damage, which is permanent until a heal spell or the like is cast.)

item.title: Spring Lock (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A padlock secures this door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 23

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The 10' area next to the lock is spring activated. If the lock (Disable Device DC 25) is opened, the floor launches into the ceiling. Spring (DC 21 Reflex save or take 2d6 damage and fall prone); multiple targets (all targets in 10' square in front of lock)

item.title: Sneezing Powder (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A curtain separates the two chambers.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 17; Disable Device 16

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The curtain is covered in powder that causes sneezing. Sneeze powder (DC 12 Fortitude save or target is staggered for 1 round)

item.title: Dart Doorbell (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A button is next to the locked door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 19

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

If the button is pushed, a dart shoots out. Dart (+6 ranged melee for 1d3 damage plus poison - DC 14 Fortitude save or take 1d3 Dex damage)

item.title: Sheathed Dagger Door Handle (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door handle is long and thin.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 16

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The door handle is a sheathed dagger, if pulled, the sheath slides off. Dagger (+6 melee for 1d4+1 damage)

item.title: Hanging Dagger (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door appears to be a bit rickety.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger proximity; Reset Repair

Effect

When the target moves to the other side of the door, a dagger hanging on a rope falls. Dagger (+8 melee for 1d4+1 damage)

item.title: Bell Elevator (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This elevator has a curved ceiling.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device 19

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

When the elevator arrives at its designated floor, a hammer strikes the outside, causing a loud, resonating sound. Bell Elevator (DC 16 Fortitude save or become staggered for 1 round); multiple targets (all targets in elevator)

item.title: Electric Coins (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A chest is in the corner.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The chest is full of gold. When touched, the coins discharge an electrical charge. Electrical Charge (6d6 electrical damage, DC 22 Reflex save for half damage)

item.title: Spring Loaded Jump Point (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
There is a small chasm in the middle of the hallway, but it's an easy jump.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

The chasm is 30' deep and 10' across. However, the floor on this side is on springs. Any jump attempt compresses the springs, adding +5 to the DC of the jump check.

item.title: Glue Filled Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door seems stuck.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

If the door is broken (DC 25 break check), glue leaks out. Glue (DC 22 Reflex save or become stuck to door, requiring a DC 25 CMD, Strength or Escape Artist check to escape)

item.title: Birthday Cake (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A birthday cake is here, with 30 burning candles.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

If the candles are extinguished, the cake blows up one round later. Cake (6d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Greasy Stairs (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A stone spiral stairway leads down.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

About halfway down, a few of the stairs have been greased. Greased Stairs (DC 21 Reflex save or slip and fall down stairs, taking 2d6 damage)

item.title: No Gravity Elevator (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The base of the hill is grassy.

Type: magical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device -

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

When the elevator floor descends, the party does not, until the elevator hits the bottom 60 feet down. Elevator (DC 19 Will save or fall 60', taking 6d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets in elevator)

item.title: Poison Doorknob (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A door is at the end of the hall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The doorknob is coated in poison. Poison (DC 19 Fortitude save or take 1d6 Con damage)

item.title: Tired Bed (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A bed is covered with plush sheets and blankets.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device 25

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone touched the bed, they become fatugued. Bed (DC 15 Fortitude save or gain fatigued condition)

item.title: Firewall (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The wall seems weak, it could probably be breached.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the wall is breached, it is replaced with a Wall of Fire at CL 7.

item.title: Spiked Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door is stuck.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 23

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The door is filled with lots of sharp spikes which cut if the door is forced open. Spiked Door (DC 18 Reflex save or take 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Acid Drip (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Fluid drips down from various spots in this cavern.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

One of the dripping spots is acidic. Acid drip (+16 melee for 1d6 damage)

item.title: Plate Glass (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small crevasse looks like it could be easily jumped.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

Halfway across the crevasse, a very clean plate glass window is installed. Window (DC 18 CMB check. If successful, glass shatters, causing 1d6 damage + 1 bleed damage, otherwise, target falls, taking 4d6 damage)

item.title: Muddy Floor (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is wet and muddy.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

The mud is thick and slows movement. The entire area is treated as difficult terrain. Additionally, each PC must make a DC 19 CMB check or be immobilized.

item.title: Fine Dust (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The air is full of fine dust.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

The dust is very viscous and gets everywhere. Once the characters leave the immediate area, it can cause the PC's footing to fail. Dust (DC 16 Acrobatics check for every move or standard action or PC falls prone); multiple targets (all targets in dusty area)

item.title: Change (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This area looks like a large vault.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The party's money is changed to copper pieces. Change (DC 21 Fortitude save or all money carried by PC is exchanged for the equivalent amount in copper pieces); multiple targets (all targets in vault)

item.title: Loose Carpet (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A long carpet runs down the hallway.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The carpet slips when trod upon. Carpet (DC 16 Reflex Save or fall prone)

item.title: Player Piano (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
As you walk into the room, a piano begins to play by itself.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

When any PC gets within 5' of the piano, shards fly from it. Piano (2d6 piercing damage, DC 16 Reflex Save negates); multiple targets (all targets in 15' cone)

item.title: String (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A long hallway is before you.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

A string lies along the floor into the wall. When a PC runs past, a kobold in the adjacent room pulls the string, tripping the PC. String (DC 16 Reflex save or fall prone)

item.title: Copper Trip Wires (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several trip wires are in the hall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

The tripwires trip any PC walking through the area unless they make a DC 18 Acrobatics check to avoid them. However, if they are removed, the electrocute the PC. Trip Wire (DC 17 Fortitude save or take 2d6 electricity damage)

item.title: Gold Disgust (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Twisted golden statuettes are set into small alcoves.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the statuettes are disturbed, the PC is cursed. Gold Disgust (DC 22 Will save or the target gains the sickened condition whenever they are within 30' of gold)

item.title: Contact Dart Trap (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A wooden door is on the side of the hall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 21

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

If the door is opened, a dart flies out. Dart (+8 melee for 1d3 damage). If the dart misses, it hits the back wall, causing it to explode. (6d6 damage, DC 18 Reflex for half); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Acid Patch (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Acid drips from the ceiling.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The drips can be avoided with  DC 20 Acrobatics check. Otherwise, the drip hits a PC. Acid Patch (9 acid damage first round, 9d4 the second and 9d6 the third round. The acid can be removed with a full round action)

item.title: Greasy Rope (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A rope hangs down the side of the building.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 21

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

When a PC climbs the rope (DC 5 Climb check) it becomes covered in thick grease 20' up. Greasy Rope (DC 25 Climb check or fall, taking 2d6 damage)

item.title: Imploding Image (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several portraits hang in this room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device 34

Trigger visual; Reset None

Effect

One of the portraits concentrates on a single target, slightly moving his eyes. Imploding Picture (target takes 10 points of damage per round, for up to 9 rounds, DC 27 Fortitude save negates; removing the portrait from wall, DC 34 Perception check to locate, also ends the effect)

item.title: Golden Beehive (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A great golden beehive is in the back of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If the hive is disturbed, 3 wasp swarms, centered on the PC, appear and attack.

item.title: Small Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small door leads out of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

If the door is opened, the target is halved in size. Small Door (DC 16 Fortitude save or become affected by the reduce person spell)

item.title: Hammer Ladder (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A ladder leads up to the roof.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 21

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

One a PC gets to the top of the ladder, a hammer slams down on a hand. Hammer (+8 melee for 1d2 damage and then a DC 22 Reflex save or fall, taking 3d6 damage)

item.title: Rusting Doorknob (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorknob is shaped as a hand.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If anyone touches the doorknob, it immediately tries to touch something metal on the PC. Rusting Doorknob (+12 melee touch to destroy one metal object on target)

item.title: Mirror Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door seems to be made from a single mirror.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the door is opened, the mirror shatters. Mirror (DC 17 Will save or take a -1 penalty on attack rolls and saves for 1 hour)

item.title: Invisible Broken Glass (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large open window is in the side of the building. It looks like it could be easily entered by jumping over the small chasm.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The window is actually filled with invisible, jagged, broken glass. Invisible Broken Glass (+16 melee for 4d6 damage plus 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Sovereign Bolt (CR 11)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The base of the hill is grassy.

Type: magical; Perception DC 35; Disable Device DC 35

Trigger proximity; Reset 1d6 rounds

Effect

When a PC gets to within 30' of this trap, a small bolt strikes the target. Sovereign Bolt (DC 30 Reflex Save or take 1d8 damage plus 1d8 bleed damage. The bleed damage can only be stopped by removing the bolt, which has been glued into the wound. Only universal solvent, a wish, or cutting the area around the bolt will stop the bleeding. If the area is cut out, the target must make a DC 30 Fortitude save or take 15d10 shock damage)

item.title: Dagger Drop (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The ceiling is shrouded in shadows.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

The ceiling is packed full of daggers pointing downwards. When it is triggered, they shower down. Dagger Drop (10d4 + 10 damage, DC 23 Reflex save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Spider Doorknob (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorknob is shaped like a spider, and made of iron.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger touch; Reset 1 day

Effect

If the doorknob is touched, it summons a spider swarm for 4 rounds.

item.title: Paper Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doors in this abode are wood and paper, and they slide open.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

The paper is sharp and cuts. Paper Door (+8 melee or take 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Switchblade Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door has an ornate pull knob.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

When the knob is pulled, a switchblade extends and retracts quickly. Switchblade (+8 melee for 1d4 damage)

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I cannot WAIT to use some of these on my group!

item.title: Burning Hands Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The carpet down this hall is covered in patterns of hands.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Two hands, splayed out are on the door. To open the door, they must be pulled down. Burning Hands (1d4 damage in 15' cone, DC 11 Reflex save for half damage)

item.title: Glass Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door is made of opaque glass.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The door is stuck (DC 14 Strength check to unstick). If the check succeeds, the door shatters. Glass Door (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Ghosts (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This looks like a linen closet.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The sheets fly off the shelves and cover the party. Sheets (DC 21 Reflex save or be blinded and entangled. Requires a DC 21 Escape Artist or CMB check to escape as a standard action); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Cornucopia (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A cornucopia, filled with food, sits on the table.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 23

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The cornucopia is filled with fake food. If the cornucopia is disturbed, it fires like a blunderbuss. Cornucopia (+16 ranged melee for 1d6+1 damage); multiple targets (all targets in 15' cone)

item.title: Sticky Walls (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The walls on the left side are dripping with a sticky substance.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device 30

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

The wall is covered in sovereign glue. Anyone touching it is stuck. About halfway down the hallway, a gust of wind blows from the right side. Gust of wind (+18 vs. CMD or be blown into wall, getting stuck on sovereign glue); multiple targets (all targets in hallway)

item.title: Sand Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Just a normal, wooden door. Yup.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 17; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

When the door is opened, a small cloud of sand is dispersed. Sand (DC 14 Reflex Save or be blinded for one round, and sickened for 1d4 rounds after that)

item.title: Roller Doorknob (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door has two, closely spaced bars for handles.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

The knobs roll once they are touched, crushing the hand. Rolling Knobs (DC 19 Reflex Save or take 4 Dex damage)

item.title: Stained Glass Floor (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is topped with a layer of stained glass, covered in holy symbols.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If a holy symbol is stepped on (DC 20 Acrobatics to avoid) the floor melts. Stained Glass Floor (3d6 damage plus become entangled, DC 21 Reflex save for half damage and negates entanglement. DC 21 Strength or Escape Artist check required to escape. Area becomes difficult terrain, all acrobatics check DC's are increased by 5, and a DC 15 Acrobatics check is required to run or charge. Those falling take 1d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Drain Room (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
There is a large hole in the center of the sloped floor.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 23

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

Water begins to fill the room at a fast rate, swirling towards the hole. Drain (DC 24 Reflex Save or be swept down the drain, falling, taking 10d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Bungled Trap (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Seems like a normal door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

The trapped door has been layered with a simple magical trap. Bungled (DC 16 Will Save or Disable Device check is at a -20 penalty for the door)

item.title: Falling Portcullis (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A brick archway is ahead.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

When the target passes under the archway, a portcullis falls. Portcullis (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 2d6 damage and become pinned, requiring a DC 18 Escape Artist or Strength check to escape)

item.title: Pit Mosaic (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A pit is realistically portrayed on the floor in a tile mosaic.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device 27

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

Anyone who examines the mosaic closely or touches it falls into a pit that magically appears. Pit (DC 18 Reflex save or fall into pit, taking 2d6 damage, DC 25 Climb check required to escape the 20' deep pit)

item.title: Spyglass Barrel (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A mounted spyglass looks out the window.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The spyglass is actually the barrel of a gun. If looked through, it fires. Spyglass Barrel (+8 touch melee for 1d8 damage)

item.title: Acid Mat (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small mat is in front of the door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device DC 25

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

If the mat is stepped on, a small splash of acid hits the target. Acid (1d3 points of acid damage, no save)

item.title: Thistles (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Thistles block the way.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger location; Reset None

Effect

If someone tries to get through the thistles, they explode. Thistles (3d6 damage plus 1d6 acid damage, DC 19 Reflex save for half damage and no acid damage); multiple targets (all targets within 10')

item.title: Shocking Doorknobs (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door has six knobs that need to be turned at the same time.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device 22

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

When all of the knobs are turned, an electrical charge discharges. Electrical Charge (10d6 electricity damage, DC 23 Fortitude Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets touching knobs)

item.title: Pepper Spray (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The desk has several drawers.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

If any of the drawers are opened, a cloud of black pepper sprays from the desk. Pepper (DC 17 Fortitude Save or become blinded for 1 round and sickened for 1d4 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within 15')

item.title: Greasy Doorknob (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorknob is shiny.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The doorknob is covered in grease. (DC 18 Reflex Save or take a -2 to Dex based checks until grease is removed, which requires one hour)

item.title: Rotting Staircase (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The staircase looks to be in bad repair.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

The staircase is badly damaged, if two people traverse it, it collapses. Staircase (2d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets on stairs)

item.title: Slow Chest (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large chest, covered in runes, is in the back of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device 29

Trigger touch; Reset 1 day

Effect

If the chest is opened, everyone is slowed. Slow (DC 21 Will save or be slowed as the slow spell for 7 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within 60')

item.title: Force Balls (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
There is a long, narrow corridor in front of you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Several invisible balls hang from the ceiling made from force. When the first one is hit, it swings, hitting the others. One round later, they swing back. Force Balls (DC 22 Reflex Save or take 2d6 damage each round in hallway)

item.title: Pressure Cooker (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several covered pots sit on the lit stovetop.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The pots are secured shut. If opened, the hot contents spray into the room. Pots (DC 18 Reflex save or take 2d6 fire damage); multiple targets (all targets within 20')

item.title: Razor Drain (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Something shiny is at the bottom of the drain.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

There are a few gold coins at the bottom of the drain. Several razorblades are on the sides of the drain pointed downwards. They only cut when the hand is withdrawn. Razors (+24 melee for 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Pull Apart Ladder (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A ladder leads up to the roof.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 21

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

Once a PC nears the top, the target is shackled to the ladder as it violently splits apart. Ladder (DC 26 Reflex save or take 10d10 damage)

item.title: Shot Put Shaft (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A climbable chimney leads upwards.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

About halfway up, a 10lb shotput falls down the shaft. Shotput (DC 21 Reflex save or take 6d6 damage, and another DC 21 Reflex save or fall, taking 3d6 damage)

item.title: Crossbow Arch (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An brick archway is up ahead.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

A crossbow is mounted above the arch on the far side. Crossbow (+8 ranged melee for 1d8 damage)

item.title: Mirror Landing (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several small landings are on the other side of the chasm.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device 26

Trigger proximity; Reset None

Effect

There are five landings, but only one of them is real. If the wrong landing is chosen, the character falls, and the landing disappears. Landings (20d6 falling damage)

item.title: Shaking Hand Gauntlet (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornate gauntlet is on the table.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the gauntlet is disturbed, it grabs the PC and shakes vigorously, slamming the target up and down. Gauntlet (DC 24 Reflex save or take 10d6 slam damage)

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I love this trap, it needs to be used in a campaign.

item.title: Spiked Peekhole (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A peekhole allows a view of the adjoining room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device 17

Trigger touch; Reset None

Effect

If the hole is looked through, a spike shoots out from the wall into the viewer's forehead. Spike (+16 melee for 1d4+1 damage + 1 bleed damage)

item.title: Razor Toes (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is made up of thin planks of wood.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

Several small razors spring out from the floor, slicing up between the toes. Razors (DC 22 Reflex save or take 6 bleed damage and be slowed until bleeding stops)

item.title: Mummy Wrap Door (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorway is covered by a thick cloth.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the cloth is disturbed, it wraps itself around the target. Cloth (+8 vs CMD or target becomes helpless, DC 18 Escape Artist or CMB check to escape)

item.title: 21 Gun Salute (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Twenty-One statues of musketeers stand at the ready on the side of the hall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger proximity; Reset repair

Effect

When a target crosses the room halfway, the statues fire. 21 Gun Salute (DC 22 Reflex Save or take 2d6+1 damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Big Rock (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A wooden door leads into the otherwise featureless tower.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC -

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

A single goblin atop the tower drops a rock on anyone who tries to open the door. Rock (+8 ranged melee for 1d10 damage)

item.title: Exploding Brick (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The brick wall is unevenly constructed.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

One of the bricks explodes on contact. Exploding brick (DC 33 Reflex Save or take 3d6 blast and 3d6 falling damage)

item.title: Wrist Dart Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A set of hands seems to be the way to open the double doors.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the hands are moved, a dart fires from one of them. Dart (+8 ranged melee for 1d3 damage, plus DC 14 Fortitude Save or fall asleep for 1d4 hours)

item.title: Guillotine Door (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An open door beckons you to enter.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

A sharp guillotine drops down on anyone walking through the door. Guillotine Door (DC 28 Reflex Save or take 3d6 damage plus 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Hold Me In The Flames (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The wall behind you bursts into flame!

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device DC 32

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Once the flames appear, a giant hand materializes in front of the target, and shoves him into the flames. Hand (+24 vs. CMD or be pushed into flames, taking 2d6+13 fire damage per round, It is a DC 24 CMB or Escape Artist check to escape)

item.title: Cigar Cutter Ring (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornate ring is barely visible under a sheaf of papers.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 24

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The ring radiates moderate enchantment if tested. If worn, the ring's inside becomes a sharp edge, and it constricts, severing the finger. The cutting action is a mechanical effect. Ring (DC 38 Reflex Save or take 1d6 bleed damage and a -2 penalty to Dexterity until a regeneration or other similar spell is cast, restoring the finger)

item.title: Oven Mitt (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A gorgeous gauntlet sits in a glass case.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device DC 32

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The gauntlet is made from mithril and inlaid with jewels. When worn, it grants a +2 AC and a +2 Dex bonus. However, when worn, the first time the wearer exerts himself (combat, climbing, running, etc) he will find that the glove can no longer be removed. Each round, the wearer must make a DC 24 Fortitude Save, if it is made, they take 1d4 fire damage, if failed, they take 1d4 fire damage, plus an additional 1d4 fire damage for each failed save. When the exertion stops, they they take fire damage each round that is reduced by 1d4 until it is zero. The glove can only be removed by a wish, remove curse or similar spell at CL 20.

item.title: Sparking Sword (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A longsword, with an exquisite pommel, hangs from the wall, sheathed in an ornate scabbard.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The room is full of an inflammable gas. Any open flame ignites the air. The sword is a tight fit. When unsheathed, it creates several sparks, which ignites the air. Sparking Sword (6d6 fire damage, DC 24 Reflex save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in room) The longsword is masterwork, and worth 500gp.

item.title: Air Cannon (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A narrow, but deep pit blocks the way.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

The pit is 5 feet across, and can be cleared with a DC 5 Jump check. It is very deep, though - 100 feet and covered in spikes. However, when a target jumps, an air cannon is activated in the ceiling. Air Cannon (Increased Jump DC by 15, failure causes target to fall into pit, taking 10d6 + 5d3 damage)

item.title: Deaf Door (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door appears locked.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the lock is unlocked, a pistol loaded with blanks fires. Pistol (DC 18 Fortitude Save or become deafened by 1d4 hours)

item.title: Spark Drawer (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A chest of drawers is at the back of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device DC 25

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the door is opened, a random, fine object on the target sparks and catches fire. Spark (Fine or smaller item catches fire as if lit by flint and steel, but ignites instantly. Magical items get a DC 10 Fortitude save)

item.title: May The Force Be With You... Always (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small cache of treasure is in the middle of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device DC 31

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the treasure is touched, the target is encased in a resilient sphere, that is permanent until dispelled. Force (DC 24 Reflex Save or be affected as the resilient sphere spell)

item.title: Not Really Spiky Floor (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor below the balcony is covered in spikes.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 1

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The spikes are cleverly painted on the floor to appear to be spikes. They are just paint and only look like spikes when viewed from the balcony.

item.title: False Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door appears locked and stuck fast.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The door is fake, and has a strong spring behind it. False Door (If a DC 25 Strength or Break check succeeds, the spring compresses, and then uncompresses, sending the target flying backwards into the wall for 2d6 damage, DC 18 Reflex Save negates)

item.title: Spring Ladder (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A ladder leads up the outside of the tower to windows at 10, 20 and 30 feet.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The ladder is set on a spring, which goes off when the target reaches 21', just past the second window. Spring Ladder (Ladder fires 60' into the air. DC 28 Reflex Save to jump to open window or take 8d6 damage)

item.title: Needle Grass (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small dropoff leads down to a grassy yard.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The grass is actually made of small needles, coated in poison. Needle Grass (+16 melee for 1d4-1 damage and on successful hit, DC 14 Fortitude Save or fall asleep for 1 hour)

item.title: Blast Manacles (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Chains are attached to this side of the closed door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The door is stuck and requires a DC 23 Strength check to pull open. Using the chains grants a +2 circumstance bonus. However, the chains will grapple the target. Blast Manacles (DC 16 Reflex Save or target is pinned by chains, only able to move in a 5' area. Unless disabled, removing the chains via a DC 25 Escape Artist or Strength check causes them to explode, dealing 1d6 damage)

item.title: Milk and Cookies (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A glass of milk and a plate of cookies sit on a small table near the hearth.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 24

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset repair

Effect

Once a target gets within 10' of the hearth, the room is filled with an odorless, colorless poison gas. It can be countered within 6 rounds by eating a cookie and taking a sip of milk. Gas (DC 22 Fortitude Save or metabolism is slowed, causing 2d6 Con damage and causing the target to be fatigued until the Con damage is healed completely)

item.title: Box (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A long corridor is in front of you.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

A wooden box falls from the ceiling. Wooden Box (DC 18 Reflex save or take 1d6 damage and be trapped inside the wooden box, DC 17 Strength check to escape)

item.title: Lantern (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door is locked.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

When the door is opened, a lantern appears near the target and shoulder height, following them and providing illumination for 1 hour. The lantern has hardness 5, 10 hp and is AC 15. If it is destroyed, burning oil spills out on the target. Oil (DC 17 Reflex save or take 1d6 fire damage)

item.title: Tripwire (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A tripwire runs across the hallway.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the tripwire is cut, a rock falls from the ceiling. Rock (DC 18 Reflex save or take 2d6 damage)

item.title: Spinning Hatch (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A hatch, with a circular wheel is in the floor of this small closet.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 23

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the wheel is turned, clamps fire, securing the hands as the wheel spins very quickly, spinning the target while dragging him against the walls. The very walls that have sprung spikes. Spinning Hatch (DC 26 Reflex save or become entangled with wheel, DC 26 Escape Artist or CMB to escape, and take 3d6+3 damage per round for 1d4 rounds until wheel stops spinning)

item.title: Pancake Door (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The iron door is locked.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

If the door is opened, an iron plate swings down from the ceiling, smashing the target. Pancake Door (DC 24 Reflex save or take 10d6 damage)

item.title: Clog (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The archway is full of wet gunk.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The gunk is holding back a flooded passageway behind it. Clog (DC 18 CMD check or be knocked prone and pushed back 5 feet); multiple targets (all targets within 15')

item.title: Steam Tank (CR 13)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A boiler trembles in the corner.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 16; Disable Device DC 34

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset none

Effect

The tank explodes shortly after entering the room, or immediately on failed Disable Device check. Tank (10d6 fire and 10d6 piercing damage, DC 28 Reflex Save for half piercing damage); multiple targets (all targets within 60')

item.title: Bent Nails (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Bent nails stick out at irregular intervals in this narrow hall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The nails tend to snag on passing targets. Nails (DC 18 vs. CMD or become entangled for one round)

item.title: Jeweled Dagger (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A jeweled dagger sits in a stand.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the dagger is touched, it slashes the target. Dagger (+8 melee for 1d4 damage plus black lotus extract)

item.title: Dimensional Pie in the Face (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The hallway is covered in portraits.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device DC 32

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

A cream pie hits the target in the face. Pie (DC 25 Reflex Save, if failed, then a DC 25 Fortitude Save or eyes are teleported to the astral plane, permanently blinding the target)

item.title: Lawn Dart (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A wooden chest, riddled with gouges, sits in the far corner of the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

When the chest is opened, a huge dart is lobbed in from the far side of the room. Dart (+8 ranged melee for 1d6 damage)

item.title: Paper Walls and a Brazier (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The walls and doors are paper on wood frames.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

One of the doors is slightly stuck. When opened, it knocks over a lit brazier into the wall, setting it on fire. Brazier (DC 18 Reflex save or knock over brazier. Fire does 1d6+1 damage per round to any PC in its square. Fire spreads 5 feet each round, and each square burns for 1d3-1 rounds); multiple targets (all targets in burning squares)

item.title: Stuck Iron Double Doors (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Iron double doors stand ajar.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The doors are stuck fast, but look like they can be squeezed through. Double Doors (DC 23 Reflex save or doors shut, trapping the target, requiring a DC 23 Escape Artist, Strength or CMB check to escape. The doors heat up, doing 1d6 fire damage per round)

item.title: Flaming Doorway (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several barrels of water are in the corner of this small room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

Shortly after a target enters the room, the doorway bursts into flames, quickly filling the area with smoke. The barrels seem to be filled with water, but are actually filled with fluid that explodes on contact with flames, which also causes the other barrels to explode. The liquid can be identified as not water with a DC 23 Alchemy check. Flaming Doorway (DC 22 Fortitude Save each round or gain suffocation condition, if barrel used, the flames go out, but it does 10d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex for half); multiple targets (everyone in barrel room) Anyone going through the flaming doorway takes 2d12 fire damage.

item.title: Wall of Force Window (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The room shakes and buckles, there is only one escape, out thru the window!

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The window is a wall of force. The PC bounces off the window and back into the collapsing room is egress is attempted that way.

item.title: Self Locking Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door shuts behind you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset none

Effect

The door shuts behind the target in this small closet. Door (DC 18 Reflex Save or be locked in closet. DC 20 Disable Device or DC 20 Break check to escape)

item.title: Collapsing Ledge (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small ledge protrudes from the wall, with a door. It is only a small jump.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Any weight on the ledge causes it to collapse. Ledge (DC 19 Reflex save or fall, taking 3d6 damage)

item.title: Welcome to Home Mat (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornate mat is in front of the door, it says, "Welcome to Home".

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device DC 34

Trigger proximity (spell); Reset none

Effect

If the door is opened without permission, the wording on the mat changes to "Welcome to Hell" as it becomes a gate to Hell. Hell (DC 27 Reflex save or fall through gate, ending up in Hell)

item.title: Stuck Dagger (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A jeweled dagger is stuck into the wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The dagger's handle is slippery, and, if pulled, reveals sharp edges. Dagger (DC 17 Reflex save or take 1d4 plus 1 bleed damage)

item.title: Crumbling Wall (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An unstable brick wall has a single door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the door is opened, parts of the wall collapse, sending up a cloud of dust. Dust (burnt othur fumes); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Greased Rung (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An iron ladder leads upwards.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

One of the ladder rungs is covered in grease. Greased Rung (DC 17 Reflex Save or fall, taking 2d6 damage)

item.title: Paralyzing Statue (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A statue points ahead with a single finger. On that finger is a jeweled ring.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If touched, the statue paralyzes the target. Statue (DC 18 Fortitude save or target is paralyzed for 1d6+2 rounds. Additionally those within 10' of target must make a DC 18 Fortitude Save or become sickened for the duration of paralyzation)

item.title: Bag of Gold (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A bag of gold sits in the palm of the statue's hand.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the gold is removed, the statue falls over. Statue (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 1d6 damage). There are 12gp in the bag.

item.title: Kicked Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door opens towards you.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 24

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

When a target gets near the door, a burly guard kicks the door open from the other side. Door (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 1d6 damage and gain the stunned condition for 1 round)

item.title: Glass Floor (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
It's only a 10 foot drop to the floor below.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The floor below is opaque glass over a 30' pit. Glass Floor (4d6 damage plus +16 melee for additional 2d6 damage and 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Sliding Floor (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A spiky door is in front of you.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

When a target gets within 10' of the spiky door, the floor slides quickly towards the door. Sliding Floor (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 1d6+3 damage)

item.title: Sad Clown (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A portrait of as clown is at the end of the hall, near 2 doors.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset none

Effect

If either door is opened, the clown takes on a sad face, causing despair. Sad Clown (DC 21 Will Save or take a -2 penalty to attack, saving throw, skill, ability checks, and damage rolls); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Icicle (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several icicles hang above the door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Several icicles fall when the door is opened. Icicle (+8 melee for 4d4 damage)

item.title: Acid Leak (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Water drips from the cavern ceiling.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset auto

Effect

At one specific place, a stream of acid leaks from the ceiling. Acid (+16 ranged melee for 2d8 acid damage)

item.title: Loose Bricks (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The brick wall is unevenly constructed around a door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The door is stuck, and requires a DC 18 Strength check to pull open. When it is, a few bricks above it fall. Bricks (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 2d6 damage)

item.title: Cacophonous Organ (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A pipe organ takes up one wall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset none

Effect

The organ begins playing loud, discordant music. Organ (Spells require a concentration check, and all other concentration checks are increased by 5 for 5 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within 20')

item.title: Concealed Closet (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
It looks like there is a concealed door on the wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Beyond the door is a small closet. When entered, the door closes and locks. Door (DC 18 Reflex Save or be closed in small closet. Door requires DC 25 Disable Device check, DC 25 Break check to open. Door has 5 hardness and 10 hp)

item.title: Recessed Valve (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A valve wheel is in a small, recessed spot in the wall next to a sliding door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 24

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

When the valve wheel is turned, a dagger strikes down. Dagger (+8 melee for 1d4+1 damage plus target gains entangled condition, required a DC 14 Strength check or Escape Artist check to escape, escaping causes an additional 1d4 damage)

item.title: Walking on Eggshells (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is littered with what looks like eggs, fixed into place.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The eggs are fragile but can be walked on with care. If not, they break spilling acid, which quickly dissolves the surrounding eggs. Egg (DC 24 Acrobatics check for each movement action or egg shell breaks; Broken egg shell - DC 19 Fortitude save or take 1d6 acid damage); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Silence the Sentry (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doors and windows to this room are locked.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset none

Effect

Anyone entering the room will not be able to call out when whatever bad stuff befalls them. Silence the Sentry (DC 16 Will Save or target is unable to make a loud noise, those further then 15' away will be unable to hear anything they say. The effect lasts for one round)

item.title: Boiling Oil (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An archway is ahead.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

The ceiling of the archway contains several holes. A kobold tending a pot of boiling oil pours it on anyone who passes through. Boiling Oil (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 3d6 fire damage, those within 5' of target must make a DC 18 Reflex Reflex Save or take 1d6 splash damage)

item.title: Weak Shale Tiles (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is made of uneven shale tiles.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

Several of the tiles cover shallow pits and are weak. Stepping on one of these tiles causes it to break. Tiles (Each movement action, target must make a DC 19 Reflex Save or take 1d2 damage and fall prone); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: I Don't Need a Heal (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large portrait of a judge is at the end of the hall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset none

Effect

Once a target gets within 30' of the portrait, it is affected by a loathing of the cleric or paladin in the party. Loathing (DC 19 Will Save or target gains nauseated condition whenever they are within 60' of the cleric, or paladin if no cleric. If neither of these, choose a spellcaster with healing abilities or a party member at random, this effect lasts for 5 days)

item.title: Swinging Portcullis (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A closed portcullis blocks the way.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

When the portcullis is lifted (DC 18 Strength check) it goes all the way up, triggering a second portcullis which swings out from behind towards the party. Portcullis (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 3d6 damage and be knocked prone); multiple targets (all targets within 10' in front)

item.title: Itching Powder Sand Bags (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The hallway ahead is narrow.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

Sandbags full of an itching powder fall on the target's head. Sandbag (DC 18 Reflex save or take 1d6 damage, then, all targets within 30' must make a DC 17 Fortitude save or become nauseated for 1d4 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Petrifying Statue (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A statue is near the door, its hand reaching out for you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The statue's hand and arm stretches out to attack the nearest target. Statue (+6 vs. touch AC, successful hit deals 1d4 Dex damage and slows the target. A DC 21 Fortitude Save negates the slow effect. The statue will attack, once per round the same target as long as it is within 30'. If the target's Dex is reduced to zero, it is petrified permanently into stone.)

item.title: Rolling Ball (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large, spiky ball rolls down the corridor.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 23

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

A large, spiky ball comes down the corridor, if it strikes someone, the spikes break off and the ball stops, otherwise, it hits the back wall and explodes. Spiky Ball (DC 22 Reflex save or take 3d6 piercing damage) Exploding Spiky Ball (10d6 fire damage, DC 24 Reflex save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Stitching Cloth (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door is covered by a black cloth.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the cloth is touched, the target's external items turn into embroidery on the cloth. Stitching Cloth (DC 22 fortitude save or all external items, armor, weapons, belts, etc disappear into the cloth and appear as embroidery. This effect lasts for 9 days, then the items reappear as normal)

item.title: Spring Loaded Floor (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A short, 10 foot drop leads down to a floor below, which appears to be in a narrow hallway.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The floor below is spring-loaded, and when a character lands on it, it shoots him sideways into the wall. Spring Loaded Floor (6d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage)

item.title: Broken Heart (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A portrait is ahead, depicting the love of your life.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The portrait reaches out with a hand covered in a writhing black aura and touches the target; the hand passes through the chest straight to the heart. Broken Heart (+6 vs. touch AC for 2d6 negative energy damage and target gains staggered condition for 1 round; critical hit causes target to be staggered for 1 minute)

item.title: Rocket Bricks (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several bricks are missing from the walls in the hallway.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 24

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

Bricks fire out from the walls at uneven intervals. Rocket Bricks (+16 ranged melee for 3d6 damage, plus DC 17 Fortitude save on hit or be staggered for one round); multiple targets (each target in hallway, one attack per 30')

item.title: Floating Bridge (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A bridge across the lake floats on top of the water.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device DC 32

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When a target passes the middle of the lake, a vortex appears, swallowing the bridge. Vortex (DC 25 Reflex Save or take 3d6 bludgeoning damage; those that fail save must make a second DC 25 Reflex Save or be caught in the current for 13 rounds, taking 1d8 damage per round); multiple targets (all targets within 15' of primary target)

item.title: Net and Rock (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An open window look out on a panoramic vista.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset repair

Effect

A net falls on the target looking out the window, which is attached to a large rock, which falls, pulling the target out the window. Net and Rock (DC 19 Reflex Save or become entangled. Once entangled, the target has one round to make a DC 19 Escape Artist check, or a DC 24 Strength or CMB check to escape; otherwise, target is pulled out window and falls 30 feet, taking 3d6 damage, and remains entangled)

item.title: Potion Lab (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several potion bottles are arrayed on the table of this high-ceilinged alchemical lab.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If any of the potions are opened, a geyser of boiling water bursts forth from the bottle. Geyser (DC 22 Reflex save or take 3d6 fire damage, plus be thrown 40 feet into the air, taking an additional 4d6 damage and landing prone in a random adjacent sqaure, a successful save negates the falling, halves the fire damage and pushed the target into an adjacent sqaure, and also does 1d6 fire damage to everyone within 20')

item.title: Deep Floor Fryer (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is slick with grease.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

The floor tile caves in, dropping the target in boiling oil; a large block also falls from the ceiling, covering the hole. Deep Floor Fryer (DC 22 Reflex Save or fall in hole, taking 3d6 damage per round. A DC 22 Strength check plus a DC 22 Acrobatics check is required to move the stone from underneath while the Acrobatics check is not required from above. A DC 22 Climb check is required to escape the pit once it is uncovered and is a full round action. After 1d4 rounds, if not uncovered, the oil explodes - DC 22 Reflex Save or everyone within 30' takes 1d6 fire damage. The stone lands in a random adjacent square as well, dealing 2d6 damage, DC 18 Reflex Save for half damage)

item.title: Lunar Painting (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A painting of moon phases is at the end of the hall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Anyone who looks at the painting becomes enraged, attacking with natural weapons. Moon (DC 21 Will Save or target becomes dazed for one round as it drops anything held, and grows teeth and claws that deal 1d6 per claw and 1d4 for bite. For 5 rounds, the creature acts as if under confusion and rage spells, then, it becomes dazed as it returns to normal)

item.title: Razor Knob (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door can be opened by depressing the lever on the handle.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

When the lever is depressed, it slides down over a razor. Razor Knob (DC 16 Reflex save or take 1d4 bleed damage)

item.title: Sticky Slide (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A slide goes down into darkness. A errant arrow fires into the slide from the opposite wall at regular intervals.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Once a target starts down the slide, he becomes sticky, slowing his descent by 1/4. At this rate, and arrow strikes every round. Sticky Slide (DC 18 Will save or speed slowed to 1/4, causing a +8 ranged melee attack every round for 1d8 damage, otherwise, an arrow attack happens every 4 rounds)

item.title: Spiky Hallway (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A stone hallway is before you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

The hallway is actually covered in carefully camouflaged sharp stones. Anyone moving through the hallway moves at half speed and takes 1d8 points of damage per 5 feet of movement. Additionally, the target must make a DC 21 Reflex Save or have their speed halved for 24 hours, or until a cure spell is cast or another PC succeeds at a DC 21 Heal check after spending 10 minutes dressing the wounds.

item.title: Mortar by the Door (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A mortar is outside of the door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger location; Reset Repair

Effect

When a target walks through the door, the mortar fires into the air. Four rounds later, the shell lands down the road, 90 feet away. Mortar Shell (6d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 15')

item.title: Toppling Iron Wall (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An iron wall appears in front of you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device DC 31

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

An iron wall suddenly blocks the 20' wide passageway. Then it topples over. Iron Wall (DC 24 Reflex Save or take 10d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets within 15')

item.title: Stuck Metal Door and Gas (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A metal reinforced door is swollen and stuck.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The room is filled with an odorless, flammable gas. If metal is used to open the door, whether to pry or hack, it sparks and ignites the gas. Door and Gas (10d6 damage, DC 24 Reflex for half damage, those that fail the save also catch on fire, taking 1d6 points of fire damage per round until a extinguished via a full round action); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Saturated Ceiling (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The ceiling appears to be wet.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC -

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The ceiling is super saturated with acid. If it is disturbed in any way, the acid pours into the room. Acid (10d6 acid damage, DC 24 Fortitude save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Tomb of Twilight (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The tomb is covered in dust.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When the inner door is opened, a huge cloud of dust billows from it. Dust (DC 18 Fortitude Save or all creatures in a 10' burst are fatigued. Additionally all mundane and any magical light sources of spell level 2 or lower are extinguished)

item.title: Wait, I already tried that? (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
You discover and bypass a simple mechanical trap.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

This trap work well layered onto another simple trap. When the target bypasses or sets off the trap, he immediately forgets that he even detected the trap, and must do it again. This time, however, the trap could be set up to be harder or more deadlier the second time around. The target must make a DC 16 Will save to prevent this.

item.title: Roof Mousetrap (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The wall is uneven, making it fairly easy to climb, even if it is tall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The top of the wall is lined with spring loaded wires that come down hard when two hands are placed on the wall, severing digits. Mousetrap (DC 22 Reflex Save or take 1d8 Dex damage and 1d10 bleed damage. Target is unable to hold anything in their hands until a cure spell is cast, and target is also dazed until a DC 20 Heal check is made, target also falls from top of wall, taking 4d6 damage)

item.title: Mirror Treasure (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Your reflection is in a mirror, but it is holding a jeweled necklace, which it extends towards you, out of the mirror.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The target must make a DC 22 Will save or they will reach for the necklace. The hand then grabs the target and pulls them through the mirror. (+19 CMB attack). If it succeeds, the mirror shatters as the target is pulled through. The target takes 6d6 damage, 1d6 Charisma damage, 1d6 bleed damage and is dazed for one round.

item.title: Loose Nails (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The wooden floor is in a state of disrepair.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger location; Reset auto

Effect

The floorboards are full of broken and extruding nails. A DC 18 Acrobatics check is required every 15'. Failure results in 1d4 bleed damage.

item.title: Shadow Pits (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The lighting in here creates several spots of deep shadow.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger location; Reset automatic

Effect

There are several 3'x3'x10' pits throughout the room. Due to the shadows, they are hard to see. Carrying a light source that is torchlight or more grants a +5 perception bonus. Pit (DC 18 Reflex Save or fall, taking 1d6 damage)

item.title: Voice Alarm (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
As you approach the door, a mouth animates on the door itself, and asks, "What is the password?"

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Once a target gets within 5' of the door, the magic mouth activates. If the wrong password, or no password is spoken, the mouth will spray forth flames if an attempt is made to open the door. Flames (5d6 flame damage, DC 19 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Boulder and Rubber Wall (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A boulder rolls down the hallway towards you.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

The wall at the end of the hallway is rubber, when the boulder hits it, it rebounds back. Boulder (DC 22 Reflex Save or take 3d6 damage, be knocked prone and staggered for 1d4 rounds; rebound - DC 24 Reflex Save or take another 3d6 damage and be knocked prone); multiple targets (all targets in hallway). Boulder moves at 60' per round.

item.title: Dead Man's Hand (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A deck of cards is on the table. A hand of 5 cards is face down.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the hand is examined, it is a two pair hand of black eights and aces. Dead Man's Hand (For the next two rounds, whenever target rolls a d20, they must roll twice and take the lesser result, no save)

item.title: Resonant Bars (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The archway has several vertical bars blocking it off.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The bars can be bent with a DC 26 Strength check, however, they snap back, and like a violin string, make a sound which resonates throughout the chamber. Bars (DC 24 Fortitude Save or take 8d6 sonic damage and be knocked unconscious, after regaining consciousness, target is dazed for 1d4+1 rounds. A successful save takes half damage, and target is staggered for one round); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Fake Collapse (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Stones, pebbles and dirt start to rain down on you from the ceiling.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

It looks as if the ceiling is collapsing as debris rains down from above. Collapse (2d6 damage, and treat area as difficult terrain for 3 rounds, when rubble disappears); multiple targets (all targets within 40')

item.title: Overbalanced Wall (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The brick wall looks like it could be scaled easily.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

The wall is not anchored correctly. When a target climbs 30', it topples over. Wall (6d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (other targets within 30' on falling side of wall take 3d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage)

item.title: Finger Portrait (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A portrait is right next to the entrance of this office.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

As the target passes thru the door, the portrait briefly animates, giving the target the finger. Finger (DC 16 Will Save or suffer a -10 penalty to Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate or Performance checks for 1 hour)

item.title: Icy Floor (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is covered in a sheet of ice.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

About halfway across, a thin sheet of lava pours out onto the ice. Then the ice collapses. Ice Floor (DC 19 Reflex Save or take 1d6 fire damage, then 1d4 rounds later, DC 22 Reflex Save or fall into icy water as floor collapses, taking 1d6 cold damage per round. It requires a DC 24 Climb check to escape the water); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Discharge (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sign by the door warns against loaded or drawn weapons.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

A target with a loaded firearm has it discharged. Discharge (+4 vs CMD to discharge loaded weapon, which may injure target or someone nearby)

item.title: Acid Sprinklers (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
There are several holes in the floor.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

Several of the tiles are on posts that depress into the floor when stepped on. This motion causes the acid underneath to spray out of the holes. Acid (3d6 acid damage, DC 19 Reflex Save for half); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Duck Idol (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large duck idol sits on the floor, blocking the doorway.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the duck is moved, the target takes a penalty on it's next attack of check roll. Duck (DC 16 Will Save or target takes a -20 penalty on next attack roll or check that requires a d20)

item.title: Don't Break That Case (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A simple crown is stored inside a glass display case.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Any non-magical object that is used to break the glass is immediately sundered. The crown is worth 200gp. DC 18 Will save negates.

item.title: Strangle Knob (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorknob is high up on the door, and is in the shape of 2 brass hands.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

When the hands are touched, they lash out and clamp on the neck of the target, strangling them. Hands (+16 vs CMD to become grappled and gain the suffocating condition. It requires a 26 CMB or Escape Artist check to become free)

item.title: Fog Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
As you open the door, thick fog billows out.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the door is opened, the area immediately fills with fog, as if fog cloud at CL3 was cast, centered on the door.

item.title: Sharp Coins (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The chest contains lots of copper coins.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Several of the copper coins have extremely sharp edges. Coins (+8 melee attack for 1d3 damage and 1 bleed damage)

item.title: Diseased Nails (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The wooden floor is in serious disrepair, and has puddles of filth in places.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

Several of the nails are sticking out, bent and sharp, and covered in slime that inflicts the target with filth fever. Nails (DC 18 Acrobatics check for each movement action or take 1 point of damage and make a DC 12 Fortitude Save or contract filth fever)

item.title: Loose Boards (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A short jump leads down to a wooden floor below.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Several of the boards are loose. When a target lands on one, it pivots, smacking them in the back of the head. Loose Boards (+8 melee for 1d6 damage plus target is dazed for 1 round)

item.title: Loose Wall (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This narrow ledge hugs a wall high up.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The wall is loose, and if leaned on, collapses. Every now and then, the ground shakes. Shaking ground (DC 22 Reflex Save or wall collapses on target, causing them to fall, taking 10d6 damage. If target is braced against wall, they get a -2 penalty to save); multiple targets (all targets on ledge)

item.title: Walls (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Walls appear everywhere as the party is ambushed.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device DC 32

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

As the party travels through the room, earthen walls appear, separating the party. Walls (10 ft high walls appear, separating the party. Each wall has 180 hp, is 5 feet thick, requires a DC 60 break check to breach or a DC 20 Climb check to scale)

item.title: Infinite Riches (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The room is filled with treasure everywhere!

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device DC 34

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Surprise! There is enough wealth here to last for generations. However, if taken, the amount of wealth stolen is the amount that must be paid by each target to reclaim their soul. The treasure itself is worthless. April Fool's! Wealth (DC 27 Will Save or target must pay at least 200,000 gp or their soul becomes trapped in a lower plane)

item.title: Whoopie Cushion (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A padded chair is in front of the desk.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

If anyone sits on the chair, it lets out a huge cloud of gas, which is ignited, Gas Cloud (4d6 fire damage; DC 19 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in 20' cone behind chair)

item.title: Poison Enhancer (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A needle pricks your finger while opening the chest.
