Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The poison trap has been magically enhanced to accelerate the onset of poison, as per the accelerate poison spell. Accelerate Poison (DC 18 Fortitude Save or poison is accelerated as per spell)

item.title: Weak Glass Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A glass door leads into the next room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The glass is weak. If the door is pushed, it breaks. Glass (DC 19 Reflex Save or take 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Canon Doorbell (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A rope pull comes out of the door to ring the doorbell.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

When the rope is pulled, a canon behind the door fires grapeshot. Canon (+16 ranged melee for 4d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets in 30' cone in front of door)

item.title: Wet Paint (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor looks freshly painted, and a sign next to it says, "Wet Paint".

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

If someone steps on the floor, the trap is set off. Wet Paint (Drains 1d6 Int, Wis, and Cha, but not below 1 for 40 minutes)

item.title: Save The Date (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A table is next to a pool of lava. On the table is a jeweled silver chalice, a gold ingot, and a date.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If anything on the table is disturbed, it topples into the lava. If the date hits the lava, it causes the lava to splash. Any item can be saved with a DC 22 Reflex Save. Lava (6d6 fire damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Collapsing Handhold (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The brick wall is unevenly constructed and has lots of handholds.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

One of the handholds collapses when weight is put on it. Handhold (DC 19 Reflex Save or fall, taking 2d6 damage)

item.title: Player Piano (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornate piano sits along the back wall. It begins playing a haunting melody.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device DC 31

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The piano plays for 1d4+6 rounds, then ends in the final round with a loud finale. Finale (2d8 sonic damage plus 3d6 bleed damage for 1d6 rounds, DC 24 Fortitude Save negates bleed damage); multiple targets (4 targets within 60 feet)

item.title: Rubber Band Trap Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A trap door in the wall is nailed shut.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

A rubber band has been stretched behind the trap door. If the trap door's nails are removed, the rubber band snaps. Trap Door (DC 19 Reflex Save or take 3d6 damage, be moved 20ft back against the wall and be knocked prone)

item.title: Oil Spritzer (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A fine mist fills the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger proximity; Reset Repair

Effect

The mist is a viscous oil. Viscous oil (-2 to all Dex based skill checks and abilities. Additionally, any character who touches an open flame takes 1d6 fire damage for 1d4 rounds); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Observatory Door (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door leads to a large, domed observatory.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 24

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

When the door is opened, the observatory turns, slamming the door shut. Door (DC 22 Reflex save or take 8d6 crushing damage)

item.title: Disarming Circle (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor has several small circle patterns in the tile. A large, marble hand is at the end of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

If someone steps on one of the circles (requires a DC 25 Acrobatics check per move action to not step in one) the target is disarmed. Disarm (+5 vs CMD or target's weapon is taken and ends up resting in the marble hand)

item.title: Broken Spring Loaded Floor (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The hallway has a wooden floor.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

Several floor tiles in here are spring loaded, but due to age, they have deteriorated. Now, when stepped on, the tile breaks, and the spring strikes the target and entangles them. Springs (+15 vs. CMD or target takes 1d6 damage and becomes entangled with spring, requiring a DC 25 CMB or Escape Artist check to free oneself)

item.title: Ice Dagger (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The cave is icy.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When a target passes under a certain spot, a magical dagger of ice falls from the ceiling. Icicle Dagger (+2 ranged melee for 1d4 damage plus 1 cold damage)

item.title: Suppression (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A deep cavern blocks your way.

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device DC 34

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Halfway over the chasm, a wall of suppression appears, suppressing all magical effects as per the spell. Characters that are flying or otherwise using magical means to cross the chasm fall. The effect is 36 5ft cubes, stacked, so the fall is 180 feet. (18d6 damage)

item.title: Potion Rack (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A potion rack, full of potions, is in the back of the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Each bottle is full of a liquid which produces a poisonous vapor when opened. Poisonous Vapor (DC 18 Fortitude Save or take 1d6 damage to a random stat); multiple targets (all targets within 10')

item.title: Dimension Door Door (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door ahead is slightly ajar.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

In the middle of the room behind the door is a group of orcs. If a PC walks through the door, they are teleported right in the middle of the orcs. Dimension Door (DC 21 Will save or be teleported in the middle of the orcs)

item.title: Water Wheel (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A water wheel slowly turns in the underground river.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 23

Trigger proximity (alarm); Reset repair

Effect

As the party gets close, the wheel begins to spin quickly, spewing liquid all over the place. Water Wheel (10d6 acid damage, DC 23 Reflex save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Corrosive Statues (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The room is filled with statues, their hands outstretched.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When a target passes a statue, it reaches out to touch them. Statues (+4 touch melee for 1d4 acid damage)

item.title: Pressure Plates (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is covered in pressure plates. A gold statue sits on a small dais in the middle of the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

At least 10 pressure plates must be triggered to disarm the trap. If not, then when the statue is moved, the floor opens up to a deep pit. Pressure Plates (DC 24 Reflex Save if within 5 feet of dais or edge of room, otherwise fall 100 feet, taking 10d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Hey, I'm a Magnet (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The room's walls are filled with gold pieces and objects overflowing shelves.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device DC 32

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If any gold is touched, the target become magnetic to gold. All of the gold in the room converges on the target. Magnet (DC 24 Will Save or take 20d6 crushing damage) multiple targets (other people in room must make a DC 24 Reflex Save or take 3d6 damage from flying gold)

item.title: Don't Touch My Food (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A tray of scrumptious pastries sits on the table.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If a pastry is removed, the tray is flung into the target. Tray (+8 melee for 1d3 damage, plus target is covered in pastries)

item.title: Lunar Landscape (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large portrait portrays a close up of the moon.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The first target to come within 30' of the picture becomes moonstruck. Moonstruck (DC 21 Will Save or target becomes enraged and confused as per the moonstruck spell)

item.title: Boiling Pot of Oil (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several pots and pans are cooking on the stovetop.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 16; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When a target gets within 5 feet, water boils over into a pot of hot oil. Oil (3d6 fire damage, DC 18 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 15')

item.title: Tree Lock (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Thick branches from a nearby tree block the door.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the branches are moved or cut, the target is cursed by nature itself. Tree Lock (DC 19 Will Save or target is affected as if Nature's Exile was cast on them)

item.title: Trampoline Floor (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A trampoline is in the floor, with a ledge 10 feet above it.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The trampoline can be used to jump up to the ledge, granting a +20 circumstance bonus to the DC 40 jump attempt. The ledge is freestanding, and ropes and claws don't seem to be able stick to it. However, any creature with a total weight over 150 lb. breaks the trampoline, falling into the 20' pit below it. Pit (DC 22 Reflex save or fall, taking 2d6 damage)

item.title: This Bugs Me (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Three centipedes crawl over a small pile of gold.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the gold or the centipedes are touched, they turn into their giant counterparts and attack.

item.title: Magnetic Spikes (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several large spikes are on the far wall across from the door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 23

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

When the door is opened, the spikes become strongly magnetic. Spikes (+20 vs. CMD or target is pulled into spikes for 3d8 + 3 damage. Target takes 1d8 damage per round until freed, which requires a DC 30 Strength or Escape Artist check. The spikes will attack each round until the target is 30' or more away); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Dying Candles (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several candles flicker in a battered candelabra.

Type: magical; Perception DC 25; Disable Device DC 25

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

While the candles are burning, the smoke causes creatures below 0 hit points that are stabilized to resume dying. Candles (DC 10 Will Save or creature resume dying); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Trigger Rung (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A steel ladder leads up the masonry tunnel.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

One of the rungs is a trigger. When weight is put on it, it fires a blunderbuss blast from above. Trigger Rung (+8 ranged melee for 1d6 damage); multiple targets (all targets in a 15' cone)

item.title: Blunt Mirror (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Your reflection in the mirror suddenly speaks, "Well, you're under geared for this, aren't you?"

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The target's weapon is cursed. Blunt Mirror (for the next minute, the target's weapon is cursed. Foes gain DR 5 vs. that weapon and critical hit confirmation rolls automatically fail)

item.title: Stone Door (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An imposing, locked stone door blocks the way.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

When the door is opened, it falls forward if the lock is picked. Stone Door (DC 18 Reflex save or take 10d6 crushing damage and become pinned, requiring a DC 35 Escape Artist or Strength check to escape)

item.title: Cone Zone (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A few orange cones have been placed near a wall that is under construction.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

Anyone that steps inside the area delineated by the cones is affected by a slow spell at CL 5.

item.title: Top Heavy Dresser (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large oak dresser is along the back wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If one of the upper two drawers is opened, the dresser topples over. Dresser (DC 17 Reflex Save or take 1d6 damage and be pinned, requiring a DC 17 Strength or Escape Artist check)

item.title: Melting Away (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small pile of gold coins is on the table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the gold is removed from the room, it melts. Melting Gold (2d4 heat damage, DC 18 Reflex Save for half damage as gold melts into a puddle)

item.title: Broken Mirror (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large mirror hangs in a gilded frame on the wall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

If any target gets within 5' of the mirror, it falls. Mirror (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 2d6 damage, target also must make a DC 21 Will Save or take 6 Cha damage)

item.title: Weak Crennelations (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The top of the short wall has blocky crennelations.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If a grappling hook is attached to the top of the wall, there is a 1 in 4 chance each round that the crennelation will break, causing the target to fall.

item.title: Cage and Pit (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A 5' x 5' pit is on one side of this 10' wide corridor.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device DC 32

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

If a target goes around the pit, a forcecage (CL 13) traps the target on the square next to the wall and the pit. One round later, a hungry pit (CL 13) appears under the target. The save for this pit automatically fails if the forcecage is still in effect.

item.title: Spiky, Dead End Chimney (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A ladder ascends up the narrow chimney.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

After 10', as the target climbs, spikes, pointed upwards, pop silently out of the wall (DC 22 Perception check). These do not harm the target, until they try to descend. 30' up, the tunnel is sealed off. Spikes (1d6 bleed damage per 5' of movement downwards)

item.title: Rebuking Door (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A stout wooden door is locked.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The door has a very good lock (DC 33 Disable Device to open), and is strong (DC 35 Break check to open). If any of these fail, a magic mouth appears in the middle of the door and begins mocking and hurling insults as the PC's. Rebuke (3d8 sonic damage plus target is staggered for one round; DC 21 Fortitude save halves the damage and negates the staggering effect); multiple targets (20' burst centered on door)

item.title: Snowman (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large snowman blocks the hallway.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the snowman is disturbed, it erupts into a shower of icy snowballs. Snowballs (4d6 cold damage, DC 18 Reflex save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in 30' cone)

item.title: Hot and Sticky Door (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A locked metal door is at the other end of the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

When the door touched, the target sticks to the door, and then it begins to heat up. Sticky Door (DC 22 Reflex Save or become stuck to door, requiring a DC 22 Escape Artist or Strength check to escape. The target takes 1d4 heat damage on the first round, 2d4 on second, 3d4 on third, and 4d4 on the 4th round before the door starts to cool, decreasing by 1d4 each rouns thereafter)

item.title: Restful Sleep (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A plush, comfy bed is in the middle of the bedroom.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger touch; Reset 5 minutes

Effect

Underneath the pillows are several gems and jewelry. If they are touched, the target falls asleep. Sleep (DC 21 Will save or target falls asleep and loses the memory of events that happened 5 minutes before falling asleep)

item.title: Leaking Steam Pipes (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The brick wall is unevenly constructed.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The brick wall is easy to climb. However, at irregular intervals, jets of steam shoot through the wall. Steam Jets (DC 19 Reflex save or take 1d6 heat damage, adding +5 to the difficulty of the next climb check)

item.title: Hexagonal Floor Tiles (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is made up of hexagonal tiles.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

Several of the tiles have been enchanted with Hex Vulnerability.

item.title: Mud Trap Door (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A trap door is in the ceiling.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 34

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The top of the trap door is covered in mud, when it is opened, the mud cascades down. Mud (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 1d6 damage and be knocked prone, requiring a DC 18 Acrobatics check to stand up. Area in a 10' radius is treated as difficult terrain)

item.title: Player Piano (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
As the enemy bursts into the room, a player piano plays an off-key tune.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When a PC attacks, he instead attacks his nearest ally. Foe (DC 22 Will Save or target attacks nearest ally for 1 round and is also considered an enemy for flanking purposes)

item.title: Bell Rung (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A set of rungs allow for an easy climb up the wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The rungs form a ladder that is easy to climb (DC 8 Climb check). However, one of the rungs in the middle rings a bell when weight is applied. Rung Bell (Bell rings that can be heard for a radius of 100')

item.title: Wrathful Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A heavy wooden door is in front of you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

When the target opens the door, his enemies gain morale bonus on attacks. Wrathful door (DC 16 Will Save or enemies get a +1 morale bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against the target)

item.title: Grease Fire (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
As you go through the kitchen, fire breaks out.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Fire breaks out, and the grease all over burns. Grease Fire (1d4 fire damage per round, if water is used to put out the fire, it causes an explosion, doing 6d6 fire damage, DC 18 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Broken Vase (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A vase sits very close to the edge of the table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When a target gets within 5' of the vase, it falls off the table and shatters, filling the target with shame and remorse. Vase (Target cowers with fear for 3 rounds, a DC 18 Will save, which can be made each round, just causes target to be shaken for 1 round)

item.title: Sodium Weighted Rope (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small chasm, filled with water blocks the way. A rope, attached to the ceiling, is stashed here.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The end of the rope is weighted with a chunk of sodium. If the rope is used to swing across the chasm, the sodium becomes submerged and explodes. Sodium (3d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage)

item.title: Hanging Scarves (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several scarves dangle in the doorway.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When a target goes through the doorway, the scarves wrap around the targets neck, then turn to steel. Hanging Scarves (DC 18 Reflex save or gain the entangled condition and the suffocating condition. It requires a DC 18 Escape Artist, CMD or Strength check to free oneself)

item.title: Gas Leaks (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Rusty pipes run along the ceiling.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

In several spots, gas leaks out from the pipes, igniting open flames. Gas Leak (3d6 fire damage, DC 18 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Spiteful Treasure (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A cache of jewelry was cleverly hidden.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The first person to touch the jewelry develops a malicious intent, as per the Malicious Spite spell, against the closest ally. This requires a DC 21 Will save and lasts for 7 days.

item.title: Stuck Cabinet Doors (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several cabinets are in this room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 17; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

All of the cabinet doors are stuck and hard to open. If pulled, the hands either slip and bend the fingernails or splinters break off. Cabinet doors (+4 melee to cause target to take a -2 penalty to attack, damage and dexterity-based rolls for 1d4 rounds)

item.title: Dorian's Mirror (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
You see your reflection in a mirror in front of you, but it looks slightly different.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The mirror portrays a younger version of the target as the target ages. Mirror (DC 19 Will save or target looks in mirror, and immediately ages to the next age category for 40 minutes, taking any aging penalties but no bonuses.)

item.title: Hidden Hook (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The ladder down the wall ends before the ground. It looks like an easy drop.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

A hook is attached to the wall about halfway down, cleverly disguised to blend into the surroundings. Hook (DC 34 Reflex Save or take 6d6 damage plus gain the entangled condition. While entangled, target takes 1 cumulative bleed damage per round. It requires a DC 28 Escape Artist or Acrobatics check to escape, or a DC 24 Strength check to be lifted off by someone else)

item.title: Breaking Door (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A stout wooden door is locked.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The door is locked (DC 25 Disable Device) and stuck (DC 25 Break check). Breaking Door (DC 16 Fortitude Save or object used to break door gains broken condition, including armor)

item.title: Shooting Nails (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door is nailed shut.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The nails are pressurized. If removed, they fire out. Nails (+8 ranged melee for 1d4 damage)

item.title: Flame Torches (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Three brightly lit torches shed light in the hallway.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device DC 31

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Each torch fires a ray that strikes the nearest target within 30'. Flame Torches (+8 ranged touch attack for 4d6 damage); multiple targets (each ray, after striking a target, fires 2 more times using the target as the point of origin)

item.title: Door Pit (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The wooden door is stuck fast.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the door is forced open, it breaks, revealing a wall covered in spikes. Door Pit (DC 18 Reflex save or take 1d6+3 damage)

item.title: Unhinged (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The wooden door has large hinges.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device DC 32

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

If the door is opened, it falls off its hinges. Unhinged (DC 25 Will Save or nearest target to the door is affected by the Insanity spell)

item.title: Bubble Wrap (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is covered in something that looks like bubble wrap.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 17; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Each individual bubble is filled with poison gas. If they are stepped on they release the gas. Avoiding them requires a DC 23 Acrobatics check for each 5' moved. Gas (DC 16 Fortitude Save or take 1d3 Con damage)

item.title: Mirror Actions (CR 10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The far wall is covered in a mirror.

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device DC 34

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Once the party is within 60', the mirror activates. Mirror (DC 27 Will Save or target's actions are the mirror image. This imparts a -10 penalty to any Strength or Dexterity based check, as well as any combat roll, and a -5 to Dexterity modifiers); multiple targets (all targets within 60')

item.title: Sand Blast (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The walls in this room have several small, well-worn holes in them.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger proximity; Reset Repair

Effect

When the trap is set off, sand is fired out of the holes at high velocity. Sand (DC 18 Reflex Save or be blinded for 1d6 rounds) multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Lightning Bolt in a Copper Room (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The walls and floor in this room are made of copper that has a slight patina.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

A lightning bolt fires from the far wall. Lightning Bolt (DC 19 Reflex Save or take 5d6 damage. If save succeeds, the bolt strikes the copper on the wall, dealing 3d6 electrical damage to everyone in room, DC 19 Fortitude Save for half damage)

item.title: Sharp, Slimy Flagstones (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The flagstone floor is in bad repair and covered in green slime.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The floor is sharp. Floor (+6 melee attack every movement for 1 damage. If damage is inflicted, target must make a DC 13 Fortitude Save or take 1d3 Con damage as well. Once Con damage has been taken, no more Con damage will be dealt)

item.title: Forbidden Spell (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The room has several holy symbols on the wall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The closest spellcaster is told, by a disembodied voice, to not cast spells. Forbidden Spell (DC 16 Will Save or target may not cast spells for 1 round)

item.title: Burning Stake Ladder (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A thick wooden ladder leads up to a small attic.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device DC 31

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Halfway up the ladder, the target is pinned to one of the sides, and then it catches fire. (+16 vs CMD or target is pinned, requiring a DC 26 CMB check to escape. Each round pinned, the target takes 1d6 fire damage. After 30 rounds, the ladder collapses, freeing the target and extinguishing the flames)

item.title: Manacle Doorknob (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door has an iron rimmed, recessed doorknob.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

When the target turns the knob, the iron lining attaches to the wrist like a manacle. Manacle (DC 18 Reflex Save or target is entangled and unable to use entangled limb. DC 28 Escape Artist, Strength, Break or Disable Device check to escape)

item.title: Crossbow Winch (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The tower wall appears very smooth.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger proximity; Reset repair

Effect

A crossbow bolt fires from the top of the tower, driving itself deep into the target. An attached rope, connected to a mechanical winch lifts the target to the top of the tower. Bolt (+12 ranged melee for 1d8 damage. On a successful hit, the rope pulls the target upwards at a rate of 10ftr per round. Each round being pulled causes 1d4 damage. Each round, the arrow makes a +12 CMB attack vs. the target. If it succeeds, the target remains attached to the arrow, if it fails, the arrow comes out, dropping the target. The target can also free itself with a successful DC 22 CMB check. A DC 22 Reflex Save is required to grab the rope when falling.)

item.title: Healing Tax (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
You feel better, healed, but your purse feels lighter. You hear a distant "clink" of gold coins.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Whenever the target is a recipient of magical healing, he loses gold. Tax (DC 22 Will Save or target loses 1gp per point of magical healing received. Can be removed the same way a curse is removed. It is CL 9)

item.title: Glass Floor Over Pool of Water (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A pool of water is at the bottom of a well, a short jump down.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The water is 15' down. However, it is covered by a thin pane of glass 10' down. Glass (+8 melee for 1d6 damage and 1 bleed damage from breaking glass)

item.title: Don't Close The Chest (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large, iron-bound wooden chest is in the corner.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 23

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The chest is empty, although is has a false bottom (DC 25 Perception). Closing, the lid, however, causes all the rivets in the iron to explode violently outwards. Rivets (6d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 15')

item.title: Force Lift (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large rock comes down the hall at you as the door closes behind you. There is a small pit in front of you leading to a larger cavern below.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The opening to the pit is smaller than the rock. However, 5 feet down it is blocked by a plane of force. When the rock gets close, the plane lifts up to inches below the surface. Force Lift (10d6 damage, DC 28 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in path of rock)

item.title: Hanging Ladder (CR 13)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A rope ladder hangs from the ceiling far above.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 24

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

A rope ladder hangs from the ceiling 60' above. The chute is 30' in diameter. It works fine until more than 200lbs is on the ladder. At that point, the large block that it is attached to falls down, crushing those below, not to mention causing those on the ladder to fall. Ladder (DC 34 Reflex Save if on ladder, DC 19 if on floor, for 20d6 damage. Additionally, those on the ladder take falling damage, with no save) multiple targets (all targets on ladder, or within 10' of ladder)

item.title: Golden Goblet on a High Shelf (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A very cluttered bookshelf is filled with all kinds of stuff. On the very top shelf is a golden goblet.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The goblet sticks a bit to the shelf (DC 10 Strength check to remove). If removed, it causes the bookcase to topple. Bookcase (DC 18 Reflex Save or take 1d6 damage plus gain the pinned condition, requiring a DC 16 Strength, CMB or Escape Artist check); multiple targets (all targets in within 10' directly in front of bookcase) The goblet is worth 100gp.

item.title: Heavy Murphy Bed (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
There is a very wide door in one wall, with a handle in the middle.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 17; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

Pulling the handle (which requires a DC 13 Strength check) causes a murphy bed to come crashing down to the floor. Murphy Bed (DC 17 Reflex Save or take 1d6 damage and become pinned, requiring a DC 17 Strength or Escape Artist check)

item.title: Hack to the Face (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door has been boarded up.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the door is hacked open with a metal object at some point in the hacking, an extra-dimensional space opens up and causes the hacking to striker the target who is hacking the door. Hack (target's melee attack bonus with weapon for weapon's damage plus mods i.e a simple melee attack)

item.title: Sweeper Hallway (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The hallway is long and covered in ice. Several brooms have been placed along the side wall. A few discs of stone start to slowly slide at you from behind.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

2d4 rocks slide out from behind, separated by one round each. They must slide all the way to the other side, which can be accomplished by using the brooms to sweep in front of the stones. The stones move 5' per round, or 10' if being swept. They will stop if there is no sweeping done for 3 consecutive rounds, when they explode. Stone Discs (6d6 piercing damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Sparkler Torches (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several unlit torches line the walls.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When approached, the torches light up like sparklers. Sparkler (DC 16 Will Save or target becomes dazed for 1 round); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Jousting Rail (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A handrail is next to this long, steep staircase.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 21

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

About halfway up, one of the stairs has a pressure plate that causes a large lance, projecting into the stairway, to slide down the rail. Lance (+16 melee for 1d12+4 damage, plus +16 vs. CMD to bull rush target back 10' and knock prone)

item.title: Poisoned Leaves (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A gentle breeze causes several leaves to blow off of the trees.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The leaves are sharp and poisonous. Poison Leaves (+16 melee for 1 damage and 1 Fortitude damage, DC 18 Fort Save negates ability loss); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large hand guards the door, and wishes to play rock, paper, scissors.

Type: magical; Perception DC 32; Disable Device DC 32

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The hand will count down from three and then play. If the person loses or doesn't play, he tales the effect of the giant hand. Paper (target is smothered and covered with a large, heavy sheer of paper, +17 vs CMD or become pinned, requiring a DC 27 Escape Artist, CMB or Strength check to escape) Rock (DC 25 Reflex save or take 8d6 damage from a falling rock); Scissors (+17 melee for 6d6 damage plus 2d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Collapsing Wall (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
There is a small hole in the wall that looks like it could be crawled through.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 24

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If it is crawled through the wall collapses straight down. Collapse (DC 23 Reflex Save or wall collapses, dealing 4d6 damage and pinning target, DC 23 Escape Artist check to escape, or 1d4+1 rounds of digging)

item.title: Indecision (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The room has three doors on the opposite wall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

If the party does not immediately go to one of the doors and opens it, they are all hit by gnawing indecision once the open a door. Indecision (DC 21 Will save or target has a -10 penalty to Initiative rolls for 7 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Patterned Rolling Pin (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The tiles have several small raised carvings on them.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger proximity; Reset repair

Effect

One of the tiles in the middle sets off the trap, causing a giant rolling pin to roll across the room, imprinting the carvings into the party. Rolling Pin (DC 22 Reflex Save or take 4d6 damage and 1d4 Cha damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30' in a 10' line)

item.title: Twice Falling Rock (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large rock falls from above.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When the rock hits the floor, it is teleported back above the target to fall again. Rock (DC 22 Reflex Save or take 4d6 damage and become knocked prone; then, another DC 22 Reflex Save or take 4d6 damage and become knocked prone and pinned, requiring a DC 22 Escape Artist or Strength check to escape)

item.title: Sticky Rope (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A rope hangs from above, offering a way across the chasm. It would only take a small jump to swing across.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The rope is covered in a sticky substance. Rope (DC 22 Strength check or hands are stuck to rope)

item.title: Knock First (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An inner door leads to another room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the door is opened without knocking, as soon as the target tries to open the door, it is affected as if Hold Portal were cast at CL 1.

item.title: Poison Portcullis (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A portcullis blocks the way.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the portcullis is lifted (DC 25 Strength check), the top pokes containers of poison gas. If the winch is used, this does not happen. Poison Gas (DC 17 Fortitude Save or fall asleep for 1d4+1 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Ceiling Spikes (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The low ceilings here have barbed spikes on them.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When the trap is triggered, all creatures move up to the next size level. Spikes (DC 21 Fortitude Save or target becomes larger by one size increment. Those that become large or greater take 2d6 damage from the spikes, and are entangled, DC 21 Escape Artist or CMB check to escape); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Flammable Tapestries (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The walls are littered with torches and old tapestries.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Several of the torches are made of precious metals. However, if they are removed before being extinguished, the adjacent tapestries catch on fire. Within 1 round, they all burn, and, in round 2, the heat causes the weak ceiling to collapse. Ceiling (6d6 damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage. Terrain becomes difficult, and a DC 18 Acrobatics check is required to move more than 5' per turn. While in collapsed area, targets takes 1d6 fire damage per round); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Narrowing Spiral Stairs (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A narrow spiral stairway descends into darkness.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The stairway is a very tight fit for medium creatures. As the party progresses down the stairs, the stairway behind them narrows to the point of not allowing passage by creatures of medium size or larger. The walls are solid stone, and 20' of passageway is affected,

item.title: Loose Flagstones on Stairs (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The stairway down is made of uneven stone that is loose in places.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Several of the flagstones are loose. If stepped on, they break free. Loose flagstones (DC 18 Reflex save or fall down stairs, taking 1d6 damage and knocked prone)

item.title: Muddy Hallway (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The dirt floor of this hallway is wet.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Halfway down the hallway, when trod upon, 20' of the 10' wide hallway becomes thick mud. Mud (DC 18 Reflex Save or become immobilized for 1d2 rounds, unable to move, attack or cast spells, successful save cause target to move at half speed); multiple targets (all targets in the 4, 10' squares affected)

item.title: Very Clear Glass (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An open doorway leads outside.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The doorway is filled with a very thin, very clear pane of glass that shatters if a PC walks into it. Glass (+16 melee for 1d6 + 1d2 bleed damage)

item.title: Thanks For Dropping By (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A crown sits on the top of the tower.

Type: magical; Perception DC 34; Disable Device DC 34

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

When the crown is touched, the crown, and everything in a 10' radius is rendered weightless inside a sphere. This sphere then moves over the edge of the tower, and disappears, causing the contents to plunge to the earth. Sphere (DC 27 Reflex Save or be trapped in sphere, falling 100' for 10d10 damage); multiple targets (all targets within 10')

item.title: Pile of Cannonballs (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large pile of cannonballs is in the center of the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger proximity; Reset Repair

Effect

The cannonballs are stacked upon a section of the floor that resonates when people walk in the room. Cannonballs (If any target walks more than 30' in a turn, the cannonball pile collapses, sending cannonballs all through the room. DC 19 Reflex Save or take 1d6 damage, and entire room becomes difficult terrain) multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Chicken Bone (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A couple of potions are on a shelf.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

One of the potions has a small chicken bone in it. Chicken Bone (DC 14 Fortitude Save or gain the suffocating condition. This condition can be removed with magical healing or a DC 15 Heal check)

item.title: Simmering Stove Top (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Good smells emanate from the kitchen.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Several simmering pots on the stove smell scrumptious. Unfortunately, the fumes are harmful. Pots (DC 17 Fortitude Save or target falls asleep for 1d4 hours); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Very Thin Blades (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Was that a mosquito?

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 33; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

When the door is opened, a very thin, sharp blade slices the target. Blade (+16 melee for 1d4 damage. If the wound is not healed within 1 hour, the target must make a DC 18 Fortitude Save or take 1d6 Strength damage, due to the sharpness of the blade, it requires a DC 22 Perception check for the target to notice he's been cut)

item.title: Gun Clock (CR 5-10)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An impressive clock dominates this outdoor wall. The face is constructed of several pistols.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger time; Reset 1 hour

Effect

When the hour strikes, the guns turn and shoot, taking one shot for each hour, up to 12. Gun Clock (1-12 +16 ranged melee for 1d8 damage each); multiple targets (1 random target within 20' cone for each shot)

item.title: Poison Column (CR 11)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A narrow spiral staircase descends into darkness.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The center column of the staircase is covered in a contact poison. Poison (1d6 Con Damage per round for 6 rounds 1 minute after contact, Consecutive DC 20 Fortitude Save ends, DC 18 Acrobatics check to avoid touching column); multiple targets (all targets on stairs)

item.title: Mind Your Head (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorways and archways are all made of finely dressed stone.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The gnomes that built this place have a sadistic sense of humor. The doorways are all built to about 5' tall, but they all have illusions on them making them appear to be 7' tall. Door (DC 22 Will Save or, if over 5' tall, hit head on door frame, gaining the dazed condition for 1 round) For dispelling purposes, the illusion is cast at CL 9.

item.title: Acid Glasses in Floor (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is peppered with sunken containers of fluid.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The containers are a bit loose. After a bit, they work loose and fall out of the floor, where they hit a lower floor, jettisoning their contents of acid in small geysers. Acid (DC 24 Reflex save or take 6d6 acid damage); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Annoying Lantern (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A lantern appears out of nowhere.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

A lantern appears floating by the target after entering this dark room. Lantern (+4 touch attack, successful attack causes a lantern to float by and follow the target for 1 hour. It acts as a normal lantern)

item.title: Gas Filled Spiral Staircase (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The spiral staircase is steep, cramped, and filled with an odorous gas.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset 1 hour

Effect

The stairs and walls are covered in flint, and the gas is flammable. Metal sparks easily here. Gas (The walls can be avoided by taking a -4 penalty to attack and -2 penalty to AC for combatants using metal arms and/or armor. If not, when attacking or defending, a DC 22 CMB check must be made, or metal hits the wall causing sparks and igniting the gas for 6d6 fire damage); multiple targets (all targets in stairway)

item.title: Collapsing Spiral Stairs (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The spiral stairs collapse beneath you.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The spiral stairs collapse, but the center support remains. The support is greased and sharp. Collapsing Stairs (DC 22 Reflex Save to grab onto center support, or DC 27 to grab onto wall, or fall, taking 4d6 damage. If the wall is chosen, it is a DC 20 climb check to climb. The center support is greased and sharp, so if it is chosen, the target will start to slide at a rate of 30' per round - +8 melee for 3d6 damage per round. A DC 27 Acrobatics check is required to jump to wall); multiple targets (all targets on stairs)

item.title: Collapsing Tower (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This tall tower commands a strategic location overlooking the pass.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

The tower is 30' high and commands a 360 view of the terrain. However, it is weighted such that if an odd number of sides are manned, it will tip over. For example, if one side has more people than the opposite side. Tower (6d6 damage, DC 28 Reflex for half damage); multiple targets (all targets on tower)

item.title: Keen Lock (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The chest is locked.

Type: magical; Perception DC 31; Disable Device DC 31

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The blade in this trap has a permanent keen edge. Keen Blade (+9 melee for 1d4+1 damage with a 17-20 crit range)

item.title: Paddle Wheel Stairs (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This spiral stairway is unusually wide.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset auto

Effect

About halfway down the stairway, the steps turn into little paddle wheels, they rotate about the long axis when stepped on. The edges are also sharp. Paddle Wheel Stairs (DC 22 Reflex save or fall down stairs at the rate of 10' per round, taking 2d6 slashing damage per round for up to 6 rounds. Each round, target may make a DC 27 Reflex save to stop falling and stand up, Each 10' of movement requires either a DC 22 Reflex Save or DC 22 Acrobatics check to not fall again)

item.title: Moving Chair (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The table is surrounded by nice chairs.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The chair moves slightly backwards when a target tries to sit down. Chair (DC 17 Reflex Save or target falls prone)

item.title: Mirror Me (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornate mirror reflects your visage.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The target's consciousness is transferred to his own image in the mirror. The effect is terminated when the target's image is no longer in the mirror. (i.e. destroying the mirror, moving the body, covering the mirror, etc) Mirror (DC 21 Will Save or consciousness if transferred to mirror. Subject in mirror can see and sense things within line of sight, at +10 to DC of checks. Body is helpless and automatically fails any save and a coup de grace can be administered)

item.title: Armor? (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A rack of armor sits along the far wall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Anyone who touches any of the armor automatically has their garments and/or armor replaced with force armor that is the equivalent of chainmail in all aspects. Armor (DC 18 Reflex Save or be clad in force chainmail for 3 rounds)

item.title: Drooping Branches (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Trees with big, heavy limbs form a canopy over the road.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

One of the limbs droops down when a mounted target rides past. Drooping Branch (DC 25 Reflex Save or get struck by limb, causing 1d6 damage and target is knocked off of horse unless a DC 27 Ride check succeeds)

item.title: Screeching Harpies (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Foes leap out to attack you in the courtyard.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The rooftops are lined with harpy statues that screech as soon as the attack starts. Screech (DC 19 Fortitude Save or target provokes an attack of opportunity); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Shale Cliff (CR 8)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The shale cliff looks to be easily climbable.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

The cliff has been rigged to fracture when a climber hits a certain point. Shale Cliff (DC 27 Reflex Save or fall, taking 6d6 falling and 3d6 bludgeoning damage); multiple targets (all targets on cliff face)

item.title: Loose Cobblestones (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The street is pretty steep.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger location; Reset Auto

Effect

Several of the cobblestones are loose and sticking up, creating a tripping hazard. Cobblestones (DC 18 Reflex Save or fall prone, make a new check for each 30' moved. A DC 18 Acrobatics check will allow a PC to move up to 60' per round freely)

item.title: Dismount! (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Your horse suddenly stands up on its hind legs.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The first passing horse is transformed into a bipedal creature, and stands up. (+8 melee touch against horse AC. If successful, the horse stands up, requiring a DC 25 Ride check to not be thrown from the horse, taking 1d6 damage and being knocked prone. The horse is unable to be ridden for 5 hours after this takes effect)

item.title: Painted Window (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The only window in the room looks out upon a small courtyard.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC -

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The window is actually a small recess, cleverly painted to look like a courtyard. Those jumping through the window get stuck in a small alcove. Window (DC 19 Reflex save or get stuck in space behind window, requiring a full round action in order to extricate oneself, while in the window, the target is considered pinned)

item.title: Droning Orator (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A small statue is spouting boring poetry.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The first target to get within 30' of the statue becomes bored and his senses are dulled. Droning Orator (DC 16 Will Save or take a -4 penalty on Init checks and Reflex Saves for 1 minute)

item.title: Broken Glass Shards and Gold (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A chest full of irregularly shaped gold pieces is here.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

Several pieces of sharp glass are in with the gold pieces. Glass (+8 vs. AC for 1d6 damage plus 1 bleed damage)

item.title: Spider Mirror (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large mirror covers an entire wall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When a target looks into the mirror, he sees himself trapped in a web crawling with spiders. Mirror (DC 22 Will save or target believes he is trapped in a web, as per web spell for 9 rounds (CL 9), but also believes he is swarming with spiders, requiring a DC 22 Fortitude save at the beginning of each round or target is nauseated for one round); multiple targets (all targets in visual range of mirror)

item.title: Fireman Pole (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A pole leads down to the next level.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

The pole only goes down a few feet before a gap appears, but the surrounding area is cleverly painted to make it appear as if it goes down to the floor, where the other part of the pole sticks up in a sharp spike. Pole (DC 27 Reflex Save or become impaled on pole below, taking 4d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Mosaic Maze (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is a mosaic maze.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset auto

Effect

While walking on the floor, the target attacks random targets with melee attacks. Maze (DC 18 Will save or target's melee attacks target a random target)

item.title: Exploding Glass Pane (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large glass window is along one wall.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the glass is struck in any way, it shatters, sending sharp glass shards everywhere. Glass Pane (6d6 damage plus 1d6 bleed damage, DC 22 Reflex Save for half damage and negates bleed damage); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: Tower of Babel (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A golden model of a tower is in the middle of the room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the tower is removed, it radiates magic which causes all nearby to be unable to speak the same language. Tower of Babel (DC 21 Will save or target is unable to communicate with anyone, those that can hear him will hear gibberish. This also makes verbal spellcasting, or any spell effect that requires speech impossible. If the save is not made, this effect lasts until the tower is returned or a remove curse spell is cast vs. CL 7); multiple targets (all targets within 30' of tower)

item.title: Spinning Into the Ground Door (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A revolving door leads to the next room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

The door is fashioned like a corkscrew, once the target enters, it spins, driving down into the ground, smashing the target. Door (DC 22 Reflex Save or target takes 6d6 crushing damage and is pinned, requiring a DC 25 Escape Artist of CMB check to escape)

item.title: Revolver Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The revolving door has six chambers.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Repair (after 6 times)

Effect

Each time a target uses the door, a bullet fires from above. Revolver Door (+8 vs. touch AC for 1d8 damage)

item.title: Door Button (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A button is next to the door on the far side of the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The button simply locks the door (and closes it if open) that the party entered through, and rings a bell on the other side to alert the occupants.

item.title: Music Box (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A beautiful music box sits on a table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The music box begins to play a beautiful melody. Music Box (DC 22 Will Save or target cannot harm other creatures without taking 3d6 nonlethal damage. This lasts for 7 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within 30')

item.title: The Electrical Trap (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door is made of stout wood, bound with iron.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

The metal is electrified. Electrical Trap (3d6 electricity damage, DC 17 Fortitude save for half)

item.title: The Other Side of the Electrical Trap (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several wires, coming up from a grate on the floor, cover this iron-bound wooden door.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 10; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

This is the backside of a trapped door. Touching the wires is not a really good idea. Electricity (6d6 electricity damage, DC 17 Fortitude save for half damage, plus 3d6 fire damage, DC 18 Reflex save negates fire damage)

item.title: Chilled Door (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The metal door drips with moisture.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The door is cold, and touching it makes the target cold. Cold (DC 18 Fortitude save or target suffers the effect of extreme cold for 30 minutes)

item.title: Squishy-vator (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The elevator's doors are open.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 23

Trigger touch; Reset Repair

Effect

When the "up" button is pressed, the floor lifts, but the ceiling does not. Squishy-vator (DC 22 Reflex Save, if door is closed, add +10 to DC, or take 6d6 crushing damage); multiple targets (all targets in elevator)

item.title: Bag of Gold (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
There are small bags of coins in this chest.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If a bag is opened, it envelops the target in purple flames. Bag of Gold (Target is affected by faerie fire for 1 minute)

item.title: Elevator Pit (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An elevator is here at ground level.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

The floor is actually a pit but us cleverly disguised to look like a wooden floor through mirrors and perspective. Elevator Pit (DC 19 Reflex Save or fall, taking 2d6 damage)

item.title: Trackless Maze (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
You are in a maze of twisty passages, all alike.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When the targets enter this part of the maze, the terrain becomes difficult terrain and tracks are obliterated, increasing the DC of getting lost by 10. This effect lasts for 5 minutes)

item.title: Icy Floor (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is covered in a sheet of ice.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

As the targets walk, the ice melts, exposing nearly invisible sharp blade underneath. Blades (+8 vs. AC for 1d6 bleed damage, 1 attack per move action); multiple targets (all targets on ice)

item.title: Sodium Bridge (CR 9)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A bridge spans the deep chasm.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

When the PC's cross the bridge, it catches on fire. If any water is used on the fire, it causes the sodium to explode. (Fire 1d6 damage per round; Explosion 6d6 damage, DC 18 Reflex Save for half damage; Fall, 10d6 falling damage, DC 18 Reflex Save, Increase DC by 5 for every 5' away from edge to prevent falling); multiple targets (all targets on bridge)

item.title: You Said What? (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several statues appear to be in mid conversation.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

Any speech in this room is amplified and translated to the waiting ambushers by the statues. This gives the ambushers a +10 init bonus, and a +2 circumstance bonus to Dexterity based checks and saves.

item.title: Potion on a High Shelf (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A potion sits on the back of a tall shelf.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

Small blades sit, just out of sight, in front of the potion bottle. Blades (+8 vs. AC for 1d4+1 damage)

item.title: Toxic Wallpaper (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The walls in this building are covered in bright green wallpaper.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

After one hour of exposure, the wallpaper begins to sicken the target. Wallpaper (DC 19 Fortitude save or take 1d6 Con damage, must make a save every hour); multiple targets (all targets in building)

item.title: Loop Holes (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
This building has several loop holes for firing outside.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset 1 hour

Effect

If a firearm tries to fire through the loophole, the powder becomes damp and automatically misfires. Loop Hole (DC 16 Fortitude save or firearm automatically misfires)

item.title: Firearm Detector (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sign outside advises the party to not bring weapons into the building.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset 1 hour

Effect

Anyone who passes the threshold who is carrying a firearm has that firearm suddenly discharge, loaded or not. Detector (DC 18 Will save or firearm discharges, causing the bearer to be flat-footed until the start of his next turn)

item.title: Tripping Curtains (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The archways here are covered with heavy curtains.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 16

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The curtains have hooks near the bottom, causing the target to trip. Curtains (DC 18 Reflex save or be knocked prone)

item.title: Lava Cake (CR 7)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A huge chocolate cake sits on the table, with several burning candles on it.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 21

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the candles burn down (1d4+1 rounds) or the cake is cut, it explodes, sending super-heated chocolate everywhere. Lava Cake ( 10d6 fire damage, DC 21 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in 30' radius)

item.title: Vanity Mirror (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
An ornate mirror is along the far wall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 26; Disable Device DC 26

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The target is compelled to look at his own reflection. Vanity Mirror (DC 16 Will Save or target must stare at mirror for 2 rounds. While staring at the mirror, all creatures gain concealment from the target's attack. If the target loses LOS, he becomes blinded for 1 round and the effect ends)

item.title: Nauseous Surface (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Everything in here is covered in a thin dust.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The dust is nauseous if touched. Dust ( DC 16 Fortitude save or gain the nauseated condition for 1d6+3 rounds)

item.title: Help Me Out Here (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A barber's pole is on the wall.

Type: magical; Perception DC 27; Disable Device DC 27

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When a party member is injured, the target is compelled to help them out. Help (DC 18 Will Save or target must aid injured ally via spells or heal checks until fully treated or 3 rounds pass)

item.title: Itchy Curtains (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The doorway is covered in thick curtains.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 18

Trigger touch; Reset Auto

Effect

The curtains are covered in an itching powder. Itchy Curtains (DC 14 Fortitude Save or become sickened for 1 hour or until target can remove and clean body and clothes)

item.title: Partially Opened Sliding Doors (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A set of sliding doors, like an elevator door, sits partially open.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

If the doors are opened separately, nothing happens. However, if touched together, they electrocute the target. Doors (6d6 electricity damage, DC 24 Fortitude save for half damage)

item.title: Paper Box (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
You are trapped inside a large paper walled box.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The paper, if torn, causes nasty paper cuts. Paper (+8 vs. AC for 1d6 bleed damage)

item.title: Popcorn Floor (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor begins to heat up.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The floor is made of tiles that expand rapidly when heated. Popcorn Floor (1d6 damage every round for 1d6+3 rounds, DC 18 Reflex Save for half damage); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Stuck Double Portcullis (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A closed portcullis is ahead.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

There are two portcullises here, one of them is open and in the ceiling. The other is closed and stuck (DC 25 Strength check to open). If opened, the other one comes slamming down. Portcullis (DC 18 Reflex save or take 3d6 damage and be knocked prone)

item.title: Soft Floor (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor is covered in a soft, spongy material.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset auto

Effect

Under the material are several small holes that can twist ankles. Floor (DC 18 Acrobatics check to avoid holes for every move action. If it fails, target takes a -2 penalty to Dex and movement is slowed to half); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Seasick Mirror (CR 1)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large mirror is at the far end of the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger proximity; Reset repair

Effect

The mirror begins to move around, causing nausea. Mirror (DC 14 Fortitude save or target is nauseated for 1d4+1 rounds); Multiple targets (all targets in LOS)

item.title: Don't Open The Door (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A sliding door is up ahead.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 24; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

When the door is slid open, a large square block falls from the ceiling. Block (6d6 damage, DC 18 Reflex save for half damage)

item.title: Slow Reacting Grease (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door is a little shiny.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 17; Disable Device DC 17

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The door is covered in grease, which doesn't become viscous until 1 hour after applied. Unless removed, objects being held in 1 hour will slip out of the hand. Each time an action is performed with a held item, a DC 18 Reflex save must be made or the object is dropped.

item.title: Popcorn Room (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The walls, floor and ceiling are made up of small tiles.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 21; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger special; Reset none

Effect

The floors, wall and ceiling are covered in unpopped popcorn. If any AoE fire based spell is used in the room, it starts an uncontrollable popping. Popcorn (+12 vs. CMD or target is pushed against wall); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Dungeon Glitch (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor and walls in front of you seem to flicker in and out, showing what is behind them.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The walls and floor flicker, causing the target to fall through the opening. The walls and floor them become solid again. Glitch (DC 22 Reflex Save or fall through floor, taking 2d6 damage, and target is teleported to a random spot in dungeon up to 500 yards away)

item.title: Shadow Knife (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A jeweled, beautifully crafted knife sits on the table.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

If the knife is touched, it attacks the target. Shadow Knife (+6 vs. AC for 1d4 force damage for 5 rounds, dispelled if it cannot overcome spell resistance, (CL 5), then it is dispelled. If the knife flanks the target, or target is denied Dex bonus, it deals an additinal 1d6 sneak damage. If targeted, the knife can be dispelled, and has an AC of 12 vs. touch attacks)

item.title: Icosahedron Rock (CR 5-11)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A large, 20-sided rock rolls down the hallway towards you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

The rock is 20-sided, and numbered. Rock (DC 22 Reflex save or target takes (1-20)d6 damage, determined randomly);

item.title: Variable Steps (CR 1/2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The step seems to move!

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect

Several of the stairs on this spiral staircase lift or lower by an inch when the adjacent step is stepped on. Step (DC 18 Reflex Save or fall, taking 1d6 damage and being knocked prone)

item.title: Smoky Cavern (CR 3)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The cavern smells like smoked pork belly.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 18; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger location; Reset none

Effect

After 1d6 minutes in the cavern, the target grants a +8 bonus to any creature that tracks by smell on perception checks, a +2 bonus on attack rolls, and a -4 penalty to handling rolls . multiple targets (all targets in cavern)

item.title: Really Loud Door Bell (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A rope is in front of this door, presumably to ring the door bell.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger touch; Reset auto

Effect

When the bell is rung, it is really, shockingly, stunningly, loud. Bell (DC 17 Fortitude save or target is stunned for 1d4 rounds); multiple targets (all targets within 15')

item.title: Illusionary Hilts (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
Several swords are set into a wooden block.

Type: magical; Perception DC 28; Disable Device DC 28

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The swords are actually set in backwards, with the tip of the blade facing out and masked by an illusion. Pulling them cuts the hand. Swords (+16 vs. AC for 1d8 damage plus 1 bleed damage)

item.title: Fog Door (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
As you walk through the door, a thin sheet of fog sprays down on you.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger proximity; Reset none

Effect

When the door is opened, for pours down from the top. Fog (DC 21 Will Save or target gets a -10 penalty to Will saves and Wisdom checks for 2d6 rounds); multiple targets (all targets that pass through door within 1d4 rounds)

item.title: Glue Mist (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
A light mist is in the room.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 22; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger proximity; Reset repair

Effect

The covers anyone who enters the room, and is harmless until the target takes damage. Mist (target must make DC 18 Fortitude save when damaged, or takes 3 bleed damage. Bleed damage cannot be stopped until the target takes off clothing/armor and spends a round cleaning); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: Sandy Cave (CR 2)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The floor of the cave is covered in sand.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 19; Disable Device DC 19

Trigger location; Reset repair

Effect

When the trap is triggered, a huge gust of wind whips through the cave, sending sand everywhere. Sand (target takes 1d4 damage and is blinded for 1d4+1 rounds, DC 18 Reflex save negates damage and causes blindness for 1 round); multiple targets (all targets in room)

item.title: One Way Door (CR 6)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door opens into the next room.

Type: magical; Perception DC 30; Disable Device DC 30

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

The door is actually an illusion and teleports the target to another room, one without any entrances or exits... Door (DC 22 Will Save or target is teleported to a small room that looks just like the illusion, except it has no entrances or exits)

item.title: Punch Knocker (CR 4)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door knocker is shaped like a closed fist.

Type: magical; Perception DC 29; Disable Device DC 29

Trigger touch; Reset none

Effect

When the knocker is used, it punches the target and pushes them backwards. Punch (+8 vs touch AC for 5d4 points of force damage, and target is pushed backwards 10 feet)

item.title: Starblade Doorknob (CR 5)
item.dc:creator: pfworks
item.content:encoded:
The door has a small, brass doorknob.

Type: mechanical; Perception DC 23; Disable Device DC 22

Trigger touch; Reset repair

Effect
